126a9(mdo): ma snyed du/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi rang sangs rgyas dag la nyin cig bzhin du lba'i bas lo brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de ba'i mdu lnga'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu
126b1(mdo): mo gzham ga zhig gis/ sangs rgyas ri mor bris pa 'am/ gzugs su byas pa la mtho na 'di ni/ de bas ches bsod nams grangs myed par skyed na/ zal po sbyor ba 'am/ me tog gam/ gdugs pa 'am/ spros
126b2(mdo): sam/ mar me dbul ba lta ci smos te/ 'di ni de bas bsod nams grang sde bskyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gar la sa zhig shes/ bskas pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/ sangs rgyas bcom
126b3(mdo): ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag sa nyin cig bzhin du lnga'i zhas zas ro brgya dang ldan pa phus pa dang / de bzhi du lba'i na bza' rnams phul ba bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyibu
126b4(mdo): mo gzhan kang kis/ za na phyugs kyi shing rta sta bus 'gro ba'i bya bachub sems dpa' bsam kha phun sum tshogs pa cigs/ sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yang rung bas yongs su 'dzind te/ tha ma nyid
126b5(mdo): cig zan cig byin na yang 'di ni/ de bas ches bsod nams grangs/ myed par skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo ga la la zhig gis bskas pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du
126b6(mdo): re'i shing rta'i lta bus 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dus snyed dgas nyin cig bzhinadu lnga'i las brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du sA'i gos rnams snyan
126b7(mdo): byin pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis glang po che'i shing rta'i lta bus 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig la sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'i dge ba'i cha ba ci ya pa rung bas yongs su 'dzid /
126b8(mdo): te/ za na nyin cig zan cig byin na yang / 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs myed par skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis bskal pa kang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du glang po
126b9(mdo): che'i shing rta lta bus 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gi khams thams cad kyi rdul skad dag la nyin cig bzhin du lba'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du lba'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/
127a1(mdo): 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis zla ba dang nyi ma'i shing rta lta bus 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig la sangs rgyas la skyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yang rung
127a2(mdo): bas yongs su 'dzin te/ za na nyin cig zan cig byin na yang 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs myed par skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi
127a3(mdo): bye ma snyed du/ zla ba dang nyi ma'i shing rta lta bus 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag sa nyin cig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du sgra'i gos rnams
127a4(mdo): sbyin pa byin pa las/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu/ mo gzhan gang zhig gis/ nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gis 'gro ba'i bya chub sems dpa' gcig pa nyin cig zan cig byin na/ 'di ni des
127a5(mdo): bas ches bsod nams grangs myed pa'i skyed do// 'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa/ gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/ nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i
127a6(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag la nyin cig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang / de ba zhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ 'jam dpal rigs
127a7(mdo): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig la nyin cig zan cig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs myed par skyed do// 'jam
127a8(mdo): dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gapas la zhig gis/ bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul
127a9(mdo): steng dag sa nyid cig bzhin du lha'i bas ro brgya dang ldan 'byin pa dang / de bzhin du lba'i goso rnams sbyin pa byin pa pas/ 'jam dpes rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzham gang zhig chos kyi nam grangs 'di yi ga mi rje
127b1(mdo): ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'dug pa dang / klog pa 'di mi de bsu shes bsod nams grangs med par skyed do// bzlog ste/ sti stang ma byas pa'i myi dge ba'i las kyang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o// phyugs kyi shing d+ha/
127b2(mdo): sras 'gro ba dang / ri'i shing d+ha lta byas 'gro ba dang / glang po che'i zhing rda la bus 'gro ba dang / rba ba dang / nyi la la zhing nas bus 'gro ba dang / nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba 'ang de bzhin te/ 'das dpa
127b3(mdo): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan ga la la zhig gis/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi nyan thos kyi/ rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i zhab rnams kyi bar chad
127b4(mdo): byas pa pas/ 'jam dpas rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos/ zhadag pazhi gnyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'grus kyis 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpal gcig la ma ma dud 'gro'i skye gnas su rtogs ni/
127b5(mdo): dge ba'i a ba'i bar chad byed cing khro ba dang brnyas pa'i sems bskyed/ na 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams ma yin pagrangs myed par skyed rdod// / 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gapas sa zhig gis
127b6(mdo): phyogs// bcu'i 'jig rten gri khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi myig rgyu nas/ bdog pa thams cad thogs pa pas/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gapa la la zhig gis/ byang chub
127b7(mdo): sems dpa' sa brnyas pa'i sems bskyed de/ gshi ba dang myi snyan par smra ba dang / stsogs par byed na de bas ches sdig pa yang du skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang las zhig gis/ byang chub mos
127b8(mdo): dpa' la rkyen ci ya rung bas brnyas pa ma bskyed de spyos na/ de myi dge ba'i las des/ sems cad dmyal ba ngu 'bod chen por lus dpag tshad lnga brgya par skye bar 'gyur te/ del mgo lnga brgya yod par 'gyur ro// de'i mdo rje
127b9(mdo): mes yang kha lnga brgya lnga brgya yod par 'gyur ro// de la ma ga yems yang kha lnga 'am lnga 'am yod par 'gyur/ de sa kha re re la yang lce lnga brgya lnga brgya yod par 'gyur te/ lce re le la yang gshos lnga brgya lnga brgyas mo bar 'gyur
128a1(mdo): ro// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu le/ rigs kyi bu mo gapal la zhig/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su skyes pa'i sems can thams cad la/ dbyug pa dang mchon gyis bskur te/ bdon
128a2(mdo): pa thams cad 'phrogs pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis/ byang chub sems dpa' la brnyas pa'i sems bskyed na/ khro ba dang / gnod sems dang / za ba dang / khros pa'i sems bskyed na 'di ni de
128a3(mdo): bas ches sdig pa grangs myed pa bskyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ sdang ba'i sems kyis sems can rnams la gnod par 'dod cing / 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma
128a4(mdo): snyed dag na/ 'jig rten gi khams re re dang / gli pa re re dang / dgra bcom ba gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi srog bcad pa dang / rin po che'i mtsho da rten rin po che'i stegs bus yongs su bskor cing gdugs dang / rgyal
128a5(mdo): mtshan dang / sA'i ba dan gtsugs pa gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag/ bshig pa pas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu 'amo// gzhan gang zhig gis/ theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sem
128a6(mdo): sems dpa'i theg pa chen po nyid la sgro gtags te/ brnyas pa'i sems bskyed nas rkyen cis kyang rung / khro ba dang / gshe ba dang / myi snyan par zer ba dang / khyad du gsod par byed na 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs myed
128a7(mdo): par skyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' las/ de bzhin gshegs pa nges par 'byung ba'i phyir te/ de ni sangs rgyas kyi rigs gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pa yin no// gang byang chub sems dpa' la skur pa des
128a8(mdo): chos spangs pa yin no// chos kyang gzhan la/ chos yongs su 'dzind pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid chos so// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo ga pa la la zhig/ khros nas
128b1(mdo): phyogs 'acu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad brtson sun dag nu bcug pa sa/ rigs kyi bu / rinas kyi bu so gangs ma thos te/ byang chub sems dpalas brlab kyis phyogs zhing 'dug nas/
128b2(mdo): marungs pa rgya ba tu'o zhes zeran/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med par skyed do// lam dpas rigs kyi thalam/ rigs kyi chu 'bo gdusas zhig gis/ langam thu'i gling gi sems can sams cad kyi bdog pa 'as
128b3(mdo): ca thogs pa bas/ gzhanags zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' jig khrus sa parung bas spang na/ 'dzin rnamam ches sdig pa blangs myed pa bskyed do// 'jam dpas 'di sa ste dpe da/ ro'i rgyal po marib kyis 'dis ste/
128b4(mdo): mtho ba dang / yangs pa dang / che bas mi thams cad zil kyis mam nas/ snyam me/ snyun ne/ spang re'o// 'jam dpas de bzhin du bya chub sems dpa' chos kyi rnam grangs 'dis mos pas kyang 'di lta s+ho/
128b5(mdo): mtho la dang / yangs pa dang / che bas phyogs bcu'i dag na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rnam grangs 'dis ma sos pa/ 'jig rten gyi kham/ sa thams cad kyi rdul snyed yod pa dag gi dge ba'i phab pa ros tu
128b6(mdo): byi nang pa/ pha ro la tu phyi nang pa lnga las byung ba bskas pa grangs med par bsdogs pa 'i sa kyis mnan nas/ skam me/ sman ne// snang // 'jas dpas rigs kyi grwa 'as rigs kyi bu 'pho / gapal bzhin
128b7(mdo): gis/ phyogs 'thongag rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad byang chub kyi sems su bkod pa bas// 'jas dpas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan ga zhig/ phung po byed pa'i bzhi sa sos ya/ 'dini de bas ches
128b8(mdo): bsod nams grangs myed par skyed do// 'jam dpas gas te sems can thams cad phung po med pa'i gzhis mom par gyur da pa bas/ langs dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis/ chos kyi nas grangs
128b9(mdo): 'di la mos pa / mos nas kyang / yi ger 'brib dang / yi ge pa 'drir 'dug pa dang / klog pa dang / klog tu 'dug pa dang / pha na glegs bam du bris pa la mom nas 'dzind par byed cing mam rtse dang / me tog dang / gdugs pa dang /
129a1(mdo): spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa rnams kyis mchod par byed na/ 'di ni des ches bsod nams grangs myed par skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ phyogs
129a2(mdo): bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams thams cad tu gtogs pa'i sems can nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa dag/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa re me'i dge ba'i khra ba gzhal du myed pa grangs myed
129a3(mdo): pa rnams dang / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i lba ba rnams dang / lha'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i dge ba'i khyab rnaMs chud gzan pa bas/ gzhan ga pa zhig gis byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i apa gcig
129a4(mdo): chud zos par byas na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs myed par skyed na/ gshe ba dang / myi snyan par smra ba ste ci smos// 'jam dang de la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang sa la zhig gis/ mchod
129a5(mdo): rten gang ga'i klung gyi bye ma snyed dag na/ bshig pa dang / bsreg/ sa pa pas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis/ theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la/ gnod seMs
129a6(mdo): dang / za ba dang / khro ba'i sems bskyed de/ gshe ba dang / myi snyan pa ra smras na 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs myed par skyed do// de ci'i phyir zho// byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams nges
129a7(mdo): par 'byung la/ sangs rgyas las mchod rten rnams byung zhipa/ sangs rgyas las 'jig rten thams cad dang / lha'i ris thams cad kyi bde ba'i yo byad thams cad byung sa/ sangs rgyas kyang byang chub sems dpal las byung bas
129a8(mdo): na/ byang chub sems dpa' la sti stang ma byas pa ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad la sti stang ma byas pa yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sa sti bstang byas pa ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad la sti stang byas pa yin no// sangs rgyas
129a9(mdo): thams cad la mchod pa bla na myed pas/ mchod par byed 'dod pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod par bya'o// 'jam dpal gal te grong khyer la la zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya 'am/ bye ba stong ngam/
129b1(mdo): bye ba brgya stong ngam/ gzhal du byed pa/ grangs myed pa dag yod la/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la ma mos na/ de dag gi las ni rgyal pos 'khrug par 'gyur ba 'am/ chus khrug par 'gyur ba'i las sam/ chos rkun gyis 'khrug pa
129b2(mdo): 'ang 'gyur ba'i las sam/ mra kes 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i sas sas/ gyes 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las sam/ kla klos 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las su 'gyur ro// grong khyer chen po de na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos
129b3(mdo): ba'i byang chub sems dpa' yod na/ de'i las ni bskal pa grangs myed par mtshams myed pa'i gnas myed pa'i gnas su skye bar gyi 'gyur/ grong khyer der skye bar myi 'gyur ro// gal te byang chub sems dpal de dag gi las
129b4(mdo): rgyal pos 'khrug par 'gyur bar myi 'byung / chus 'jug par 'gyuraba'i las kyi 'byung / chos rkun gyis 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las kyi 'byung / mu ges 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las kyi 'byung / rtses 'khrug par 'a
129b5(mdo): ba'i las myi 'byung / kla klos 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las kyi 'bru/ pab/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'dis mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i da las bskal pa rgya mtsho grangs myed par sems can dmyal ba dang / dud
129b6(mdo): 'gro ba dang / yi dgas su skye bar 'gyur ba yod na der 'khrug par gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i sas bskal pa grangs myed brjodabar mtshams myed par skye bar 'gyur ba dang / de'i las bskas pa
129b7(mdo): dang / nyi shu dang / sum bcu pangan sor myong bar 'gyur ba yang / tshe 'di sa myong ste 'khrug pas byang bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir ba zhe na/ bsod nams chen po'i tshogs bsngags pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpas 'di lta ste
129b8(mdo): dper na rgya dpag tshad brgya ba ji sems pa brgya dang ldan pa'i chus gapags dugs pa stong yang gyi 'dug par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chu li phu po chen thos rab tu phye ba'i phyir lo// de bzhin du bskas
129b9(mdo): grangs myed par/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas kyi nang du gnas par 'gyur ba'i las rab tu mang ba yang rnam par smin pa myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po bsngags
130a1(mdo): pa'i phyir ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsasad pa/ dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa dpag tu myed/ grangs myed pa rnams dang / lnga dang / myi dang /
130a2(mdo): lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par stod do// / 'phags pa dad pa'i stobs bskyed pa la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba theg pa
130a3(mdo): chen po'i mdo/ rdzogs s+ho// / 6// rgya gar kar gi mkhan po su sen tra bo de dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba pa na de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan sa phab pa//
130a4(mdo): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ni yA ta a ya ta ka ti mud+ga a ba tAdapa na ma ma hA yA na su tra// bod skad du/ 'phags pa nges pa dang dam nges par 'gro ba'i phyag rgya la 'jug pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po
130a5(mdo): mdo// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la/ phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod phung po'i ri ya/ dge
130a6(mdo): slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug bcu la 'di lta ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyu rad pa dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu
130a7(mdo): chen tho ba dang / sran gi rgyal po dang / spa nang gi yang dag 'phags dang / mchod rten mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra skad rgyal po dang / de dag las stsogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug cu thams cad kyang rab
130a8(mdo): tu zhi ba rnam par nges pa'i chos 'phrul gi ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa/ zab cing brtan pa'i chu'i rgya mtsho'i dus rlabs ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ dbang bskur ba'i gzungs thob pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku mdog mtha' yas pa yongs su 'grub pa
130a9(mdo): gzungs thob pa sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ 'di skad ces gsol pa to// bcom ldan 'das phyag rgya gang gis/ byang chub sems dpal 'di dag ni/
130b1(mdo): bla ma myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma nges te/ bla ma myed pa'i ye shes kyi lam las phyir ldog par 'gyur ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges te/ bla na myed
130b2(mdo): pa'i ye shes kyi lam las phyir gyi ldog pa'o// zhes bgyi bar bdag gis 'tshal bar 'gyur ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nges par 'gro ba'i phyag rgyas la 'jug pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bstan du gsol// de
130b3(mdo): skad ces gsosad pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'jam dpas gzhon nur gyur da pa la 'di skad ces bka' sa sang ngo // 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'gro ba ni lnga po 'di dag yin te/ snga gang zhe na 'di lta ste/
130b4(mdo): phyugs kyi shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu dang / glang po che'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta/ bu dang / zla ba dang nyi mas 'gro ba lta bu dang / nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul kyis 'gro ba lta bu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta
130b5(mdo): bu ste/ 'jam dpal lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ kyi 'gro ba yin no// 'jam dpal de byang chub sems dpa' gnyis ni// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa'i 'gro bas
130b6(mdo): yin no// byang chub sems dpa' gsum ni/ bla ma myed pa yang dag pa ma rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa'i 'gro ba'i yin no// 'jam dpagis gsol dpa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' tha
130b7(mdo): na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa'i 'gro ba pa/ bla na myed pa'i ye shes kyi lam las slar ldog pa dag ga lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpal phyugs kyi shing
130b8(mdo): rtas 'gro ba lta bu dang / glang po che'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu yin te/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' 'di gnyis ni/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chubu ma nges te/ bla na myed pa'i ye shes kyi lam las phyir ldog pa yin
130b9(mdo): no// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'gro ba lta bu dang / byang chub sems dpa' nyam nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gi 'gro ba lta bu dang / byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi 'gro ba lta bu pa/ 'di
131a1(mdo): klas pa'i sa dag par rdzogs pa ma sa / byed pa'i sa na sam thaMng rgya rdzog payin no// 'am das pa nang byang chub sems dpa rgyag slob
131a2(mdo): par rig par bya zhe na/ 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu la la zhig sangs rgyas kyi khri lnga brgya'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams 'da' bar 'dod la/ der yang de'i bya dang ched bya ba chen po dang / don dang
131a3(mdo): don chen po dang / tshed che ba dang / ched che rab cig yod nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis gzhon pa ji lta bu zhig gis/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya'o snyam mo// de yang 'di snyam du dpyod de/ ma la bdag
131a4(mdo): phyugs kyi shing rta sa zhon la 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya'o gor ma chag snyam ste/ 'jam dpal myi de phyugs kyi shing rta la zhon te/ lam der zhugs nas/ de yun ring zhing dus ring mo zhag na/ dpag
131a5(mdo): chang brgyar phyind pa las de rlung kyi dkyil 'khor chen pos de nas bzlod/ nas/ dpag tshad brgyad bcu pa phyir ded de phul na// 'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/ myi res bskal pa gcig gam/ bskas
131a6(mdo): pa brgya 'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ bskal pa bye ba phrag yuM 'am/ ba skalar pa brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du myed pas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams de dge 'da' ba 'am/ 'jig rten gi khams gcig kyang 'da' bar nus
131a7(mdo): sam/ 'jam dpal gis gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni gnas ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de ni skabs ma mchis te/ phyogs kyi shing rta la 'tshal pa'i myi des bskasad pa gcig gam/ bskal pa brgya 'am/ bskal
131a8(mdo): pa stong ngam/ bskal pa bye ba phrag 'bum 'am/ bskal pa brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du myed pas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gcig kyang 'dal bar rus pa de ni ge nas ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka
131a9(mdo): stsal da pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gapa la la zhig/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed la/ theg pa chen po myi 'dzind kyi klog par/ nyan thos kyi theg pa
131b1(mdo): garnams dang ldan gcig gnas te/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag sa sten cing bsten la/ bsnyen bku byed cing / de dag dang ldan cig tu 'dris par byed sa/ kun tu spyod cing yongs spyad par byed sa/ kun dga' la ba 'am/
131b2(mdo): gtsug lag khang ngam/ 'chag sar spyod yul 'thun par gnas par byed/ nyan thos kyi theg pa klog cing kha ton/ dpyod cing khong du chud par byed la/ gzhan dag kyang klog tu 'jug pa nas khong du chud pa'i bar du byed na/ de
131b3(mdo): nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dzind pa'i dge ba'i che ba skyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa des/ shes rab rtul por 'gyur te/ bla na myed pa'i ye shes kyi lam las phyir 'dren cing phyir zlog go// byang chub sems dpa' de'i byang chub
131b4(mdo): kyi sems bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyi dang po grolas kyi cishig ni ba de yang / de nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dzin cing 'chang ba'i dge ba'i phrab pa skyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa des rdul da por byed cing / nyams pa
131b5(mdo): byed do// 'jam dpas dperan gyi lal zhig rtsig nad kyis byed zums par gyur da nas/ de rtsig dbye ba dang gzubs su rung bar/ bya ba'i phyir/ zla ba gcig gi ba bdu dpyad byas te/ zla ba gcig
131b6(mdo): lon nus myig 'byed cing 'dzugs par byed pa sas/ de'i dgra mI bajal kAn na zhig gis/ pi bi ling gi yu la spa ga gis myin bka pa nas de yang longs par byas pa de bzhin du/ 'jas dpas byam
131b7(mdo): chub sems dpa' de'i byang chub kyi sems bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyi dbang po shes rab kyi myig gang yin pa de yang de nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dzin cing 'chang ba'i dge ba'i khyab bskyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa des
131b8(mdo): rtul por byed cing nyams par byed de/ 'jam dpal 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' byugs kyi shing rtas 'gro ba'i lta bu yin par rig par bya'o// 'jam dpal ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' glang po che'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu
131b9(mdo): pa yim pa marig par bya zhe na/ 'jam dpal dpas dpe mad/ gyi sa la zhig 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nyid 'da' bar snyam la// de yang 'di snyam du dpyod de/ ma la bdag glang 'tshal zhi pa rnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa
132a1(mdo): 'dod la/ der yang de'i bya ba dang bya ba chen po dang / don dang don chen po dang / ched che ba dang ched mer ba cig yod nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis gzhon pa ji lta bu zhig gis 'jig
132a2(mdo): rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya snyam mo// de yang 'di snyam du dpyod de/ ma la bdag glang po che'i shing rtas ya na lag brgyad dang ldan pa la zhon te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'dal bar bya gor ma chag snyam
132a3(mdo): nas/ 'jam dpal myi de glang po che'i shing rta yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa la zhon te/ sam der zhugs nas/ de lo brgyas dpag tshad nyi stong du gson pa las/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen pos/ de nas phyir phul te
132a4(mdo): bzlog na/ 'jam dpal 'di snyam du sems/ glang po che'i shing rta la zhon pa'i myi des/ bskal pa gcig gam/ bskal pa brgya 'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ bskal ba bye ba phrag 'bum 'am/ bskal
132a5(mdo): pa brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du myed pas kyang 'jig rten gyi kham/ des gcig kyang 'da' bar nus sam// 'jam dpas gis gso// lad pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni gnas ma mchis so// bcom
132a6(mdo): ldan 'das de ni skabs ma mchis te/ glang po che'i shi brta 'tshal ba 'i myi des/ bskal pa gcig ga ma/ bskal pa brgya'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ bskal pa bye ba phrag 'bum 'am/ bskal/
132a7(mdo): pa brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du myed pas kyang / 'jig rten gi khams gcig kyang 'da' bar nus pa de ga nas ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsald pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin du rigs kyi bu
132a8(mdo): 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag dang lhan cig gnas te/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la dag la snyen cing ste nad cing bsnyen
132a9(mdo): bkur byed cing / de dag dang lhan cig tu 'dres par byed la/ kun tu spyod cing longs spyod par byed la/ kun dga'i ra ba 'am/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ 'chags sar spyod yul 'thun par gnas par byed/ nyan thos kyi
132b1(mdo): theg pa klog cing kha ton byed/ dpyod cing khong du chud par byed la/ gzhan dag kyang klog tu 'jug par byed cing / kha ton byed du 'jug sa yongs su sbyong bar byed bu 'dug na/ de nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i
132b2(mdo): bal bskyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa des/ shes rab rdul por 'gyur te/ bla na myed pa'i ye shes kyi lam las phyir 'dren cing phyir zlog go// byang chub sems dpa' de'i byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa las byung ba'i dge/
132b3(mdo): ba'i zha ba bskyed pa ma ngon par 'du byed pa'i shes rab kyi dbang po shes rab kyi myig gang yin pa de yang / de'i nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dzin cing 'chang ba'i dge ba'i zhab bskyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa ris rtul por byed cing
132b4(mdo): byams par byed do// 'jam dpal dper na shing gi sdong po chen po da srid du dpag tshad stong pa zhig yongs/ de yang rgyam mo chen pos khye palas par snang la gnas pa'i gnod sbyin dag gis/ de rgya mtsho
132b5(mdo): chen po'i lam las phyir phul te/ bzlog nas/ de lugs kyi ga / bu dpag tshad lnga stong yod yad pa zhig btags na/ 'jam dpal de ji snyam sems/ shing gi sdong po chen po de mtsho chen po la 'gro ba
132b6(mdo): 'am/ sems can bsgral pa'i phyir spyad par nus sam/ 'jam dpal gyos gsos pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldana'i das kyis bka' su lad pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub seMs
132b7(mdo): dpa' de'i byangasab kyi sems pasgoms pa sas byung ba'i gas rab kyi gang chen po yang / nyan chos kyi theg pa 'dzin du pa'i dge ba'i zhal bskyed par mngon par 'du byed pa des/ thams cad marjed pa'i tsho shes kyi rgya mtsho
132b8(mdo): phyir phrul zhing bzlog ste/ thams cad bakhyen pa'i leshes kyi rgya la tshom 'gro bapral rtsi 'gyur/ 'khor ba'i chu mchoms kyang sems can rnams smos myi nus te/ 'jam dpal 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' gla po tshe mdos
132b9(mdo): rtas 'gro ba lta bu pa yin par rig par bya'o// 'jam dpal ji ltar byang chub sems dpal nyi ma dang zla bas 'gro ba lta bu pa yin par rig par bya zhe na/ 'jam dpal dper na/ rmyi la la 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nyid
133a1(mdo): 'da' bar 'dod la/ der yang de'i bya ba dang / bya ba chen po dang / don dang don chen po dang / ched che ba dang / ched cher ba cig yod nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu zhig gis 'dzi//
133a2(mdo): rten gi khams de dag 'da' bar bya snyam mo// de yang 'di snyam du dpyod de/ ma la bdag gis nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'gro bas 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'dal bar bya gor ma chag snyam nas/ 'jam dpal myi de nyi ma dang zla ba
133a3(mdo): 'i 'gro bas lam der zhugs na/ 'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems myi des nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'gro bas 'jig rten gi khams de dag 'da' bar nus sam/ 'jam dpal gis gsosad pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo thog
133a4(mdo): lags so// bde bar gshegs pa yun ring mo zhag gis rdo tha go.adags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa sad pa/ 'jam dang da la de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo ga pa la la zhig
133a5(mdo): gis/ bla na myed par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag dang lhan cig tu gnas te// nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag la myi snyen cing myi sten la/ bsnyen
133a6(mdo): bkur myi byed/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa de dag dang lhan cig tu 'dris par myi byed/ kun tu spyod cing longs spyad par myi byed/ kun dka' ra ba 'am/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ 'chag sar spyod yul 'thun par
133a7(mdo): gnas par myi byed la nyan thos kyi theg pa la klog par myi byed/ kha ton gyi byed/ sems par mya byed la/ gzhan dag kyang than tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam yang klog tu 'jug par myi byed/ kha ton tu du byed du 'jug par
133a8(mdo): myi byed de/ de gang klog pa de yang theg pa chen po kho na klog la/ gang stond pa de yang theg pa chen po kho na bston na/ 'jam dpal 'dri ni byang chub sems dpa' zla ba dang nyi ma'i lta bu pa yin par rig par bya'o// 'jam dpal
133a9(mdo): dper na/ nam mkha' lding ga dbang po'i rgyal po chen po lang co dang stobs dang mthu chen po thob pa ni 'dod na ri rab kyi che mo nas ri rab kyi che mor 'gro'o/ 'jam dpas de bzhin du zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub ses
133b1(mdo): dpal/ khrims dang thos pa dang bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs dpas brtso pa/ mthu chen po thob pa yang 'dod na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing/ de bzhin gshegs
133b2(mdo): pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams su ston par byed do// 'jam dpal ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu pa yin par rig par bya zhe na/ 'jam dpal dper na/ myi la la zhig 'jig rten gi khams de
133b3(mdo): dag nyid 'da' bar 'dod la/ der yang de'i bya ba dang / bya ba chen po dang / don dang/ don chen po dang / ched che ba dang / ched cher ba cig yod nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu zhig gis 'jig rten gyi
133b4(mdo): khams de dag 'dal bar bya snyam so// de yang 'di snyam du dpyod re/ mas bdag nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrus gis 'jig rten gi khams derags 'da' bar bya snyam na/ 'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems
133b5(mdo): kyi des nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gis 'jig rten kau khaMs de dag 'dal bar/ nus sam/ 'jam dpal gas gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rngo thog lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
133b6(mdo): 'jam dpas de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gapas sa zhig bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du sems skyed la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag dang lhan cig tu myi gnas nyan thos kyi theg sa
133b7(mdo): pa dgas kyi sten gyi sten cing bsnyen bskur gyi byed sa nyan thos kyi theg pa de dag dang / spyan cig tu 'dris par gyi byed/ kun tu spyod cing yongs spyod par myi byed/ kun dga' ba 'am/ gtsug lag kha ngas/ 'chag sa spyod
133b8(mdo): yus 'gyur bar gnas par myi byed sa/ nyan thos kyi theg pa klog par gyi byed/ kha ton gyi byed/ dpyod cing khong du chud par myi byed sa/ gzham dag kyang ban tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam yang klog tu 'dug par myi byed/ kha ton
133b9(mdo): byed tu 'dug par gyi byed/ de gang klog pa de yang theg pa chen po kho na klogs/ gang ston pa de yang theg pa chen po kho na ston cing de theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpal rnams dang / theg pa chen po klog pa rnam
134a1(mdo): dang / theg pa chen po yongs su 'dzind pa rnams dang / gus pa dang bcas zhes dang bcas par byed cing der gzhol/ dpa 'bab la/ de dag dang lhan cig tu gnas te/ de dag bsnyend cing sten la// bsnyen
134a2(mdo): bku khyed de dag dang lhan cig tu 'dris par byed/ kun tu spyod cing longs spyod par byed de dag dang kun dga' ra ba 'am/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ 'chag sar spyod yul 'thun par gnas par byed la/ de theg pa chen po yongs
134a3(mdo): su tshol zhing skud la 'chang bar byed/ mar rtse dang bdug pa dang / me tog dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang da yo mas pas mchog tu gus par mchod par byed/ de theg pa chen po klog cing kha ton byed la/ dga' ba
134a4(mdo): dang / mchog tu dga' bas lung 'bogs par byed/ ma bslabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa rnams la brnyas pa'i sems kyi skyed/ bzhi na 'dzum pa dang / gsong por smras la/ tshig myi brlang gyi gtum/
134a5(mdo): myi ba thub pa dang dga' ba dang / snyan par smra zhi pa/ de srog gi phyi// ra yang theg pa chen po mya spong la/ de theg pa chen po la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / theg pa chen po klog pa rnams
134a6(mdo): dang / theg pa chen po yongs su 'dzind pa rnams la/ ci nus ci srog/ sa kyis/ snying nas lhag pa'i bsamakhas/ yongs su 'dzind par byed cing / de su dang yang lhan cig 'gyed pa dang bzod par myi byed la/
134a7(mdo): de sngon ma byung ba dang ma byung ba'i mdo sde rnams chos pa'i rang bzhin can yin zhing / gang dag las zos pa de dag sa ston pa gus pa drag po lta bu skyed par byed/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa las
134a8(mdo): ma bsrabs pa dag la khyad du gsod par gyi byed/ nyes pa bden pa dang rtsi bden pas gzhan dag la gleng bar gyi byangs nyes pa gzhan gyis 'khrus pa yang kyi chos zhing / byams pa dang / snying rjed pa/ dag la la dang / btang
134a9(mdo): snyoms la slob pa 'di ni/ 'jam dpas byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gis 'gro ba lta bu pa yin par rig par bya'o// 'jam dpal ji ltar byang chub sems dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gis 'gro ba ste
134b1(mdo): bu pa yin par bya zhe na/ 'jam dpas dper na rtsi la la zhig 'jig rten gi khams de dag nyid 'da' bar 'dod la/ dem yang de'i bya ba dang / bya ba chen po dang / don dang don chen po dang / che ba dang / ched cher ba cig yod nas/
134b2(mdo): de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis rdzu 'phrus ris bu zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag rgyu tu 'da' bar bya'o snyam so// de yang 'di snyam phung pyod de/ mas bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'dal bar bya ba'i phyi
134b3(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol pa gdab gomam chag snyam nas/ 'jam dpas kyi de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thad du song nas/ gsol ba btab ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag sangs rgyas kyi zhing lnga brgya'i rdus tha
134b4(mdo): rab kyi rdus snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dal bar 'tshal te/ de yang bdag gi bgyi ba bgyi ba chen po dang / dor dang don chen po dang / ched che ba dang / ched cher ba cig mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das
134b5(mdo): kyis bdag 'jig rten gi khams de dag 'dral bar mdzan du gsom zhes byams 'jas dpas de bzhin gshegs pas krung rtsi de 'dzin rten gyi khams de dag 'dal bar mdzad na/ 'jas dpas de'i rnas
134b6(mdo): sems/ de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten gi khams de dag myur du 'da' bar mdzad spyod dam/ 'jam dpas gis gsosad pa/ bcom ldan 'das spyod sogs so// bde bar gshegs pa spyod lags so// @
134b7(mdo): ldadan 'das kyis bka' sas dpa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin du rigs kyi bu'amajigs kyi nu 'bo gangs sa sbyig bran byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/ rgyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang das
134b8(mdo): cig tu myi gnas te/ nyan thos kyi reg pa pa dgas kyi sten gyi sten cing bsnyen bkur gyi byed pa/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa de dag dang lhan cig tu 'dris par gyi byed/ kun tu spyod cing longs spyod par gyi byed/ kun dga'
134b9(mdo): ra ba 'am/ gtsugasag khang ngam / 'chag sar spyod yus 'thun par gnas par gyi byed/ kha ton mi byed/ dpyod cing khong du chud par gyi byed la/ gzhan dag kyang zan tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam yang klog tu 'dug
135a1(mdo): par myi byed/ kha ton byed du 'jug par myi byed de/ de gang klog pa de yang theg pa chen po kho na klog/ gang kha ton byed pa de yang theg pa chen po kho na kha don byed/ gar stond pa de yang theg pa chen
135a2(mdo): po kho na stond cing / de lus dang ngag dang yid kyi yongs su dag la/ tshul khrims dang ldan zhing / dge ba'i chos can yin la/ gzhan dag kyang lus dang ngag dang yid yongs su dag pa la 'god/ tshul khrims dang dge
135a3(mdo): ba'i chos can la 'god/ theg pa chen po la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / theg pa chen po klog pa rnams dang / theg pa chen po yongs su 'dzind pa rnams la gus pa dang / bcas pa zhes dang bcas pa/
135a4(mdo): byed la/ der gzhos/ der 'bab der bab cing / de dag dang / ldan cig tu gnas te/ de dag sa sten cing sten la/ bsnyen bkur byed cing / de dag dang lhan cig tu 'dris par byed/ kun tu spyod cing longs spyod
135a5(mdo): par byed la/ de dag dang kun dga' ra ba 'am/ gtsug lag khang nga / ma/ 'chag sar spyod yul 'thun par gnas par byed/ de theg/ pa chen po yongs su chos zhing sdud la 'chang par byed/ mar me dang /
135a6(mdo): gdugs pa dang / me tog dang / spos dang / mye tog 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dag gis mchog tu gus pa drag pos mchod par byed/ de theg ba chen po klog cing kha ton byed la/ gzhan dag kyang dga' ba dang
135a7(mdo): mchog tu dga' ba chen po drag pos klog tu 'jug pa cing kha ton tu byed du 'jug/ ma bslab pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la brnyas pa'i sems myi skyed la/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de kho na la 'god
135a8(mdo): par byed/ de bzhin 'dzum zhing gsong por smral/ gzhan dag kyang bzhin 'dzum zhing gsong por smra ba la 'god/ de tshig myi brla myi gtum myi rgyu ba la/ gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de kho na la 'god cing / de dga' ba dang snyan
135a9(mdo): par smral/ srog gi phri ma yang theg pa chen po kyi spong zhing / de theg pa chen po la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / theg pa chen po klog pa rnams dang / theg pa chen po yongs su 'dzin pa rnams la/ gus par drag
135b1(mdo): so dga' bu dang / rog tu dga' ba chen pos med zla ba'i bang rtse bar gnas sa/ gan du dag kyang bsas pa chen po dang ldag pa'i bsapa bslabs pa de kho na la 'god par byed/ sra dang yang lhan cig 'gyed par
135b2(mdo): bzod par mi byed de sngonam byung ba dang / sa thos pa'i mdo sden mas gus pa drag zom don du gnye zhing thos pa dang / gang dag sa sa thob pa de dag sa stonang pas gus pa drag po ste bu sred par byed la/ gzhan dag kyang bas
135b3(mdo): pa kho na la 'dod/ gzhan byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas pa bslabs pa rnams sa yang rlo ba sems kyi byed// nyes pa bder pa dang kyi bden pas gzhan sa gleb bar gyi byed/ nyes pa gzhan gyi 'khrus pa yang kyi chos
135b4(mdo): gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de kho nas 'god par byed/ de byang chug rnasems dpa'i sa sa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khamams rnam pa ralta par byed/ gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i las
135b5(mdo): chung zas pa'i sems can gyi 'grus rnas par bsams ba byed/ de za rngum sems dra ba 'is mdud rtsom pa'i sems na kyi khams sa rnas par lta bar byed pa/ gzhan dag kyang byang chum
135b6(mdo): sems dpa'i lam chud mos pa'i sems can gyi khams sa rnam pams pas 'god par byed/ de byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa chung bos pa'i sems can gyi khams sa rnam par bsdu bar byed la/ gzham dag kyang byang chub
135b7(mdo): sems dpa'i spyod pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams sa rnam pa snga pas 'god par byed/ de byang chub sems dpa'i rgya chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams pal rnam par lta bar byed pa/ gzhan dag kyang byang chub mos
135b8(mdo): da ba'i rgyu chud zom pa'i sems can gyi khams sa rnam pa sa pal 'god par byed/ de bya chub sems dpa'i thabasas mkhas pa cad thos pa'i sems cad kyi khams sa rnas par / par byed pa/ gzhan dag kyang byang chus
135b9(mdo): sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa chung bos pa 'i sems cad gi khams sa rnam par skags 'god par byed/ de byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba'i chung mom pa'i sems can gi zhes la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang zab
136a1(mdo): chub sems dpa' bya ba chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed// de byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par 'du byed pa'i spyod pa'i stobs chud bos pa'i sems can gyi khams
136a2(mdo): sa rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par 'du byed pa'i spyod pa'i stobs chud zos pa'i sems can gi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i gan
136a3(mdo): chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i gnas chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de byams pa dang / snying/
136a4(mdo): rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms chud zos pa'i sems can gi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang byams pa dang / snying rje dang dga' ba dang / btang snyoms chud zos pa'i sems can
136a5(mdo): gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de bgo bsha'i ra// pa bzhin can yin la/ gzhan dag kyang bgo bsha'i rang bzhin canas 'god par byed// de sangs rgyas kyi chos chud zos pa'i
136a6(mdo): sems can gyi khams pa rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyi pa sangs rgyas kyi chos chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par par lta ba la 'god par byed/ dge ba'i chos la 'dund pa bral ba
136a7(mdo): sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la gzhan dag kyang dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa dang bral ba'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la bgod par byed// bcings pas bcings pa'i sems can gyi khams
136a8(mdo): la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang bcings pas bcings pa'i sems can gi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed// de yun ring po nas na ba'i sems can gi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/
136a9(mdo): gzhan dag kyang yun ring po nas na pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la la dgod par byed/ de sangs rgyas la dge ba les ba skyed pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan
136b1(mdo): dag kyang sangs rgyas la dge ba'i khyab bskyed pa chung bos pa'i sems can gyi khams lnga rnam par lta bas 'god par byed/ de 'gon myed pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang
136b2(mdo): mgon skyed pa'i sems can gyi khams sa rnam par lta ga la 'god par byed// de yun ring po nas gnyid kyis sog pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzham dag kya yum rib po nas ma
136b3(mdo): kyis log pa'i sems can gyi khyams la rnam par lta gas 'god par byed// de rigs ngan du skyes pa'i sems can gyi khams pa rnam par lta bar byed pa/ gzhan dag kyang rigs ngan du skyes pa'i sems can
136b4(mdo): gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la dgod par byed/ de byang chub sems chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la// gzhan da ga kyang byang chub kyi sems chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam
136b5(mdo): par lta ba la dgod par byed/ de byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams sa rnam par lta bar byed la/ zhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa'i chud zos pa'i sems
136b6(mdo): can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba sa 'god par par byed// den sa spyod pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams sa rnam pa mas par byed/ gzhan dag kyang chos spyod pa chud zos pa'i sems can gi khams
136b7(mdo): la rnam par lta bas 'god par byed// de bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed pa/ gzhan dag kyang bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chud thos pa'i sems can gyi
136b8(mdo): khams la rnam par lta pa la 'god par byed// theg pa chen po la mos pa'i chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams pa rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang theg pa chen po sa mos pa'i chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams
136b9(mdo): la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed// de tshul khrims kyi sdom pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang tshul khrims kyi sngo ba chud zos pa'i sems can gi khams la rnam par lta ba la
137a1(mdo): 'god par byed// de chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i chos chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba byed la/ gzhan dag kyang chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i chos chud zos pa'i sems can gi khams la rnam par lta/
137a2(mdo): bas 'god par byed/ de bzod pa dang nges pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang bzod pa dang nges pa'i chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par sta ba la dgod par byed/
137a3(mdo): de zhi gnas dang lhag mthong chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang zhi gnas dang lhag mthong chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la dgod par byed// de sbyin pa dang
137a4(mdo): dus pa dang / legs par sdom pa dang / nges pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang sbyin pa dang / dus pa dang / legs par sdom pa dang / des chud zos pa'i sems can
137a5(mdo): gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de dran pa dang / blo gros dang / brtan pa dang / rtogs pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnaM pA lta bar byed pa/ gzhan dag kyang dran pa dang blo gros dang
137a6(mdo): brtan pa dang rtogs pa chung bos pa'i sems can gyi khams pa rnam pa ralta bar 'god par byed// de pha rol tu phyind pa'i sam kyi tshul sa 'jug pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams pa rnam par smra bar byed
137a7(mdo): gzhan dag kyang pha rol tu pha nang tu phyind pa'i lam gyi tshul sa 'jug pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la dgod par byed// de sangs rgyas kyi rigs su skye ba chud zos pa'i sems kyi khams la rnam
137a8(mdo): par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi rigs su skye ba chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnaMbs pa la god par byed do// de dge ba'i bshes gnyen chud thos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta
137a9(mdo): byed la/ gzhan dag kyang dge ba'i gshes gnyen chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bas 'god par byed// de sems can la phan par 'dod pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/
137b1(mdo): gzhan dag kyang sems canas phan par 'dod pa chung mos pa'i sems can gyi khams sa rnam pams pas 'god par byed// de chos sa rton pa chung zos pa'i sems can gyis khams sa rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan
137b2(mdo): dag kyang chos sa rten dpa'i chud mos b+ha'i sems can gyi khams sa rnam par sa pa la 'god par byed// de ye shes sa rnonang pa'i chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams pa rnam par lta bar byed la// gzhan dag kyam ye shes
137b3(mdo): la rton pa chud zos pa'i sems can gi khams la rnam par sta pas 'god par byed// de don sa rton pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams sa rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang ngos la rton du pa chung zos pa'i mes
137b4(mdo): sa kyi khams sa nas pa sa pas 'god par byed/ 'dzi ma rje pon pa rnamam pa'i mams cad gyi khamasas rnam par smra bar byed pa/ gzhan dag sa pa nges pa'i drod bya ma
137b5(mdo): mnon pa'i chu gos pa'i sems par gyi khamams mas 'dod pa brjed sa ba bzhi nang thob pa'i sems can ni khams la smras pa pa 'god pa
137b6(mdo): byed// de badren pa'i chos dang don dang 'dus pa smra bas mkhas pa yonas/ gnan dag kyang bden pa'i chos dang dron dang 'dus pa skalas mkhas pas 'god par byed// de dbul po sems can gyi khams san
137b7(mdo): pas lta bar byed cing / gzhan dag kyang dbul po'i sems can gyi khams sarnas pa ska mas 'god par byed// de 'ag rten thams cad byams pas khyab par byed de// kye ma sems can 'di dag ni sa gon med d+ha/
137b8(mdo): sems can 'di dag ni skyabs byed pa/ sems can 'di dag ni dpung gnyen med pa/ sems can 'di dag ni gling byed pa/ sems can 'di dag ni gnas myed pa/ sems can 'di dag ni skyob babyed pa yin na/ kyes
137b9(mdo): nam zhig na bdag sems can 'di dag gi mgon tu 'gyur zhig su/ skyabs su 'gyur zhig su/ dbupa ka nyen du 'gyur zhig gu/ gri du 'gyur zhig su/ gnas su 'gyur zhis lung / skyob par 'gyur zhig su snyam mo//
138a1(mdo): 'jam dpal dper na bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding lung tse dang / stobs dang mthu chen po thob pa de ni 'dod na/ ri rab kyi rtse mo naswa ri reb kyi che mor 'gro'o// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul
138a2(mdo): gyis 'gro ba lta bu li byang chub sems dpa' yang dge ba'i pa'i stobs dang / mi gyogs pa dang / shugs dang / rtul ba chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du skye bar 'dod pa der yang skye bar 'gyur la/
138a3(mdo): ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung bar skyes pa'i sems can thams cad kyi mgon dang / skyabs dang / pung gnyen dang / gling dang / gnas dang / skyob par yang 'gyur ba de ni/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpal de bzhin
138a4(mdo): gsheg pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba sa bu pa yin par rig par bya'o// 'jam dpas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gapas la zhig gis phyog/ sa bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul
138a5(mdo): snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la nyin cig bzhin du s+tha'i zhas za// sa ro brgya dang ldan pa phul zhing / sna'i na bzal dag kyang phul te// de bzhin gshegs pa re re la yang nyin cig du/ 'jig rten gyi
138a6(mdo): khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal pos / ngas su gang bar byas nas/ sbyin pa'i byin te/ de ltar sbyin pa bska sad pa ka pa ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed phul la/ rigs kyi bu 'am
138a7(mdo): rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni/ sems cadan gcig rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bul ba zhag na/ 'di mde bas bsod nams grangs myed par bskyed do// 'jam dpal gas te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu
138a8(mdo): kyi bu mo gang sa la zhig gis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams thams cad kyi nus phra rab kyi rdus snyed kyi sems can thams cad rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bul bkod la/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo/
138a9(mdo): gzhan zhig gis ni/ sems can gcig lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras yul bzhag na/ 'di ni de bas bsod nams grangs myed par skyed do// 'jam dpal gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang
138b1(mdo): sa la zhig gis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdus snyed kyi sems can thams cad lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras khrus bkodas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni//
138b2(mdo): sems can gcig phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bul bzhag na 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs myed pa skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo ga pa la la zhig gis phyogs bcu la 'jig rten gyi
138b3(mdo): khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab rdus snyed kyi sems can thams cad phyir gyi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod la/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu 'tsho gzhan zhig gis ni/ sems can gcig dgra bcom pa nyid la bzhag na
138b4(mdo): 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs myed pa skyed do// 'jam dang la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mog pas la zhig gis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed
138b5(mdo): kyi sems can thams cad dgra bcom pa nyid sa bkod pa/ rigs kyi/ munyam tshigs kyi bu mogasam sa zhin gis mi/ sems can ga/ ga rang sangs rgyas nyid la bzhag na/ 'di ni de las chos sod
138b6(mdo): nams grangs myed pa bskyed do// 'jam dbas tshigs kyi bu 'am na sa kyi su 'pho gnam sa zhin gi pa/ grogs bcu'i 'jig rten hrI/ mas thams cad kyi rdus 'drarab kyi rdus skyed kyi sems can thams/
138b7(mdo): cad rang sangs rgyas nyid la dkod sa rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni/ sems can gcig ra'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bzhag na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs
138b8(mdo): byed pa skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gapas la zhig gis/ phyogs bucu'i 'jig rten gi khams thams cad kyi rdus phra ra gyi rdul snyed kyi sems can thams cad/ ra'i shingapartus 'gro ba lta bu'i
138b9(mdo): byang chub kyi sems la dkod sa rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu 'amo gzhan zhig gis ni/ sems can gcig glang po che'i zhing rtam 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bzhag na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams
139a1(mdo): grangs myed pa skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams thams cad kyi rdus 'phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi ses can thams cad/ gleng
139a2(mdo): po che'i shring rtas 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bkod la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni/ sems can gcig zla ba dang nyi mas 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bzhag na/ 'di ni
139a3(mdo): de bas ches bsod nams grangs myed pa skyed do// 'jam dpas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo ga pa las zhig gis/ phyogs bcu la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can thos
139a4(mdo): cad/ zla ba dang / nyi mas 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la ba kod la/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni/ se mas can gcig nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub
139a5(mdo): kyi sems la bzhag na// 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grang sa myed pa skyed do// 'jam dpas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo ga pa la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
139a6(mdo): thams cad kyi rdus phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can thams cad/ nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu byang chub kyi sems la ba/ da sa/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni
139a7(mdo): sems can gcig de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la gzhag na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs myed pa skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo//
139a8(mdo): ga pas la zhig gis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdus snyed kyi sems can rnams la/ nyin cig bzhin du/ sA'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing sgra'i gos dag kyang byin te/
139a9(mdo): de skar sbyin pa bskal pa gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin sa/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni dge bsnyen dad pa can gsums skyabs su songs/ bslab pa'i gzhi lnga dang ldan pa bcom
139b1(mdo): ldan 'das kyis bstan pas mngon par dgal ba gcig la/ byin zhi ga zhan cig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs myed paskyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu 'amo ga pa la
139b2(mdo): zhig gis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi nus phra rab kyi rdus snyed kyi/ dge bsnyen dad pa can gsum la skabs su song ba bslab pa'i ni lnga dang snun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bAstan dpa
139b3(mdo): mngon par dga' 'a rnams pan cig bzhin du na'i sem 'argya dang thaMd bad dang/ nas dag tu badzin te/ de ska bsnyen pa'i bas sa pa gang pa'i klung gi bye ba skyed du zim sa mas
139b4(mdo): rigs kyi bu mo gan zhig gas ni gang bag bca rgyas bsod nams gra da bskyed do// 'jam dpas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi tha
139b5(mdo): sa zhig gis rdzogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khabs thams ca/ kyai nus sgrarab kyi nus myed kyi gapa zag brgyad 'arnams pacig bzhin du wA li mas lo brgya dang snyan pa byin zhing
139b6(mdo): gos dag kya byin te/ de ska smin pa khams pa gang ka'i klung \u0f7fbres snyed du blanas rigs kyi zu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gnanan/ gagis nI/ rgyan tu zhugs pa gcig sa nyin cig ldan cis
139b7(mdo): sa/ 'don dbas ses bso na pa sa med pa skyed do// nas ky-in pa na myog su sa gnas rtsonas pacu 'a zhe mas kyis rna thar ba sbed kyi/ dang /
139b8(mdo): tu zhugs pa rnams la/ byin cig bzhin du sga'i las lo bad+ma dang ldan pa byin zhing / rtswa'i gos dag kyang byin te/ de sdar sbyin pa bskasang ba gang klung gi bye ma snyed du byinas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan
139b9(mdo): zhig gis ni san cig phyi ma'o tho ba cigs/ byin cig yan cig ziman/ 'di ni kyis bsod nams grangs byed pa skyed do// 'jas dpas rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gangs la zhig gis/ phyogs
140a1(mdo): bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams thams cad kyis rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i rnams la/ nyin cig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing / lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/ de
140a2(mdo): snar sbyin bskul pa gang ka'i klung gyi bye ma snyed du byin la/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni/ phyir myi 'ong ba 'a cig la nyin cig zan ci rkyenapa/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs
140a3(mdo): byed pa skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gapa la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten thams ca kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdus snyed cig phyir myi 'ong ba'i rnams la nyin cig bzhin du lba'i
140a4(mdo): zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/ ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang ga'i klung kyi bye ma snyed du byanas rigs kye bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni/ dgra bcom pa
140a5(mdo): gcig la/ nyin cacig zan cig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches pa/ sod nams grangs myed pa skyed do// 'jam dpas rigs kyi bu/ 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang sa la zhig gis/ phyogs bcu'i la

140a7(mdo): kri bye ma snyed du byin la/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan ga pa zhig gos ni rang sangs rgyas gcig la nyin cig zan cig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs myed bskyed do// 'jam dpas/
140a8(mdo): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gapal la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams las cad kyi dus phraral kyi rdus snyed kyi rnam rgya rnams la/ nyin cig bzhin du sba'i zas lo brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing lha'i gos dag kyang
140a9(mdo): byin te/ de skar smin pa bskas pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin sa/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni ra'i shing rnas 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' gtsigs/ nyin cig zan cig
140b1(mdo): byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs myed pa skyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpas byang chub seMs dang ga seMka ba dang gang las brtsams te/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa de'i tshe
140b2(mdo): des sems de la myi dge ba'i las ma spangs pa rdzi yang myengs/ des sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yang mazung bar byed pa'i phyir te/ 'jam dpas de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ yon tan bsam gyis myi
140b3(mdo): khyab pa dang ldan pa yin no// 'jam dpal dper na/ bya'i rgyal po ka la bying ka'i sgo nga'i sbubs na 'dug cing / myig ma bye ba dag gis kyang sgra skad kyi gdangs zab cing snyan pas bya'i tshogs thams can zil
140b4(mdo): kyis gnon par byed do// 'jam dpal de bzhin du/ dang po// sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbub sa na 'dug cing / myig las dang nyon mongs pa'i rab rib kyi
140b5(mdo): bris g.yogs pa yang dge ba'i yab yongs su sngo ba'i sbyor pa'i bsgrubs pa'i sgra skad kyis nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas mas cad zil kyis gnon par byed do// 'jam dpal rigs/
140b6(mdo): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo ga pal la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jigarten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi ra'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la/ nyin cig

140b8(mdo): tshe'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu ba'i byang chub sems dpal gtsigs nyin cig yon cig byin na/ 'di ni de mches bsod nams grangs myed par skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gsas 'is
140b9(mdo): thogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul 'phra rab kyi dus snyed kyi glang po che'i ging nas 'gro ba sa bu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la/ nyin cig bzhin du lga'i zas lo brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing
141a1(mdo): sgra'i gos dag kyang byin te/ de ltar sbyim pa bskus pa gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byinas/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis mi/ zla ba dang nyi mas 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub sems
141a2(mdo): dpa' gcig la nyin cig zan cig byin na/ 'di ni de bas bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do// 'jam dpas rigs kyi lu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gapal la zhi gri phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams thams cad kyi rdul 'phra ba
141a3(mdo): kyi rdul snyed kyi za ba dang nyi mas 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la/ nyin cig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa 'byin zhing / sA'i gos dag kyang byin te/ de ltar sbyin pa'i bskal pa grang ba'i klung gi bye
141a4(mdo): ma snyed du byin la/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gi sa ni/ nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul ki 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub sems da pa'i gcig sa nyin cig zan cig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod

141a8(mdo): dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo ga la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la/
141a9(mdo): nyin cig bzhin du s+tha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing / lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/ de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin pa/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu 'amo gzhan zhig gis ni/ chos
141b1(mdo): kyinam mangs di ma rnam par gang 'i ces par byed na/ 'di dmas ches bsod na sa grangs myed paskyed do// ma panas kyi tha'ang gas sa soganas nig gisan/ tshogs patha'i na bye
141b2(mdo): khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi kha zas byed du bcug la/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnas 'dzam bu'i bo'i gser las byas la/ nor bu rin po
141b3(mdo): che glog gi sgron mas spras pa/ nor bu rin po che sdang thams cad brtsegs stegs bus bskor ba/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / rin po che'i chun pos mdzes par byas pa/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sbrer ba
141b4(mdo): nor bu rin po tsha dbang ga rgyal po dra bas bkab pa/ dril bu g.yerakali dri'i bla re bres pa/ tsan dan sbrul gyi snying pos byugs pa/ me to ga yan da ra ba chen po dang / man dzu sha ka dang / man dzu sha ka chen po da
141b5(mdo): sA ma'i me tog dang / klu shing gi me tog dang / ta ra ni ba ra na dang / go// ta rin dang / dri mchog dang / dA nu ska ra dang / s+tha'i sna ma'i me tog/ dang / ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma dkar
141b6(mdo): bo dang / me tog chen po rnams bkram pa byed du bcug ste/ rangs ngas rgyas de dag sa swa'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhi pa/ lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/ de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang ka'i klung
141b7(mdo): gi bye ma snyed du byin la/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni/ sangs rgyas zhes gra ba 'am/ thams cad mkhyend pa nyid zhes bya ba 'am/ 'jig rten mgon po zhes bya ba'i sgra mos sam/ ri mor
141b8(mdo): bris pa mthong ngam/ gzugs su byas pa mthong na 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs myed pa skyed par 'gyur na/ gang sor mo bcu'i thal mo spyar ba lta ci smos te/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs myed pa
141b9(mdo): skyed do// gamam pa me 'am/ bdug pa 'am/ me tog gas/ spos 'bul ba ste ci smos te/ ba ma de'i yon tan bsngags pa cig tsam brjod na yang 'od na de bas ches bsod nams grangs myed pa skyed do// longs spyod
142a1(mdo): pa chen po 'grub par byed cing / mthar da kyis thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal dper na chu'i thigs pa chu ngu rgya mtsho chen po la song ba yang sreg pa'i bskal pa'i mye ma byung ba'i
142a2(mdo): bar bu bar ma dor yongs su zad par myi 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa la dge ba'i phra ba skyed pa/ ji ltar chung ba yang thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi mye ma byung gyi bar du bar ma dor yongs
142a3(mdo): su zad pa 'am mthar thugs par myi 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni ji ltar chung yang 'di lta ste/ bo pa dang khyon dang / che bas skar ma'i tshogs thams cad zild kyis mnan nas ldang nges 'dug cing
142a4(mdo): kun tu lnga pader 'dug go// 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshe gas pa la dge cha ba bskyed pa/ ji ltar chung ba yang 'di lta ste mthong / ba dang / yangs pa dang / che bas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad zisad
142a5(mdo): kyis mnan nas lhang nges 'dug go// 'jam dpal de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ yon tan bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang ldan no// 'ja
142a6(mdo): dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gapas la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdum snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byang chub sems dpa'

142a8(mdo): rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'odi thos nas/ mos par byed na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs myed pa skyed par 'gyur na/ gang yi ger 'dri ba 'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug pa 'am/

142b1(mdo): byam thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag tu med pa dag gi lus dang gos bcangs/ rigs kyi thu 'amachigs kyi thu son nan zhig gims/ 'jos te sdang ba'i sems kyis theg pa chen pos myos pa'i zang ba chub sems dpa

142b6(mdo): kyis nyan thos dpa ba sangs rgyas dpag tu myed grangs med pa dag gi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang ti pe 'dzind kyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi bu po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par gros pa'i ske
142b7(mdo): ye shes mthong ba 'i phung po med pa byas la/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni/ sdang ba'i sems kyis theg pa chen pos sos pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rgyas khrims than bslabs pa gcis
142b8(mdo): blangs pa'i tsam yang med par byas ma/ 'di ni de bras ches sdig pa grangs myed pa skyed do// de ci'i phyi zhem/ nyan thos dpa ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzind kyi phung po dang
142b9(mdo): shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par gros pa'i lenas tshong ba'i phung po ma/ rang gi sems kyi rgyad sas skyes pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams 'joms pa byed pam zad kyi/ bya chub sem/
143a1(mdo): dpa'i ni tha na nyi ma gcig gis bslab pa gcig byung ba'i ba'i tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzind kyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par gros pa'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i
143a2(mdo): ye shes mthong ba'i phung po thams can ni/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad 'jom par byed pa nas/ thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes kyi bar du thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal rigs kyi
143a3(mdo): bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo ga pas la zhig gis/ khros te gnod sems kyi sems kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad btson rang bcugs/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig

143a9(mdo): sa zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad btson rab bcug pa las bcon ma nas tha rad par byas nas/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i bde ba la bkod cing / 'khor lo la bde ba sa yang
