285a5(mdo): lta ste gan+da rta ka t+ya ya na chen po dang / gnas brtan pa ku la dang gnas brtan nye dga' bo dang / de dag las stsogs pa gzhan da/ ka kyang de nas khod de/ de dag la 'od zer gyis phog nas/ 'dar
285a6(mdo): rab tu 'dar/ dam dam rab tu dam dam/ 'khrugs rab tu 'khrug sa/ bdabs rab tu brdabs/ shur 'ur rab tu 'ur bur// khams rab tu 'ams/ rmugs rab tu mugs/ rengs rengs rab tu rengs te
285a7(mdo): de dag sa phrogs pa dag tu gyur dranas ras so// de'i tshe dge slongs la phrag brgyad mo shing 'os ras phyir byung ste/ gnas btan de dag la 'od zer gyi snang ba des pog nas shi nad tu rings par la gdong bkrus te/
285a8(mdo): gcig la gcig 'jus so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras de dag thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ dbang thob pa/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ cang shes pa/ gtso bo chen po/ chen po stong pa nyid kyis
285a9(mdo): rang gi don thob pa/ tsan dan chen po lta bu'i g.yog 'khor dang ldan pa/ seng ge chen po lta bu'i g.yoka 'khor dang ldan pa sha stag ste/ de dag las stsogs pa'i son tan dpag tu myed pa dang ldan pa de dag thams cad snga dro'o nyi
285b1(mdo): ma shar ka ra yan lag thams cad kyi ba spu n+ya skyegs kyi shid kyi me tog ltar rtsa dmar pa ni langs/ myig ni mchi ma khrag lta bus kang ste/ mchog tu sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba dang ldan nas sems can thams cad la phan pa
285b2(mdo): rang / bde ba dang snying rtse ba'i phyir dang / gdul bar bya ba'i dbang gyi don tu theg pa chen po'i mchog tu gsang ba/ stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dgongs pa'i tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyi chos kyi sgo'i tshul bshad pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan
285b3(mdo): 'das ka la ba der dong ste lpags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das ka la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar pa
285b4(mdo): btud te phyogs gcig tu 'bod do// de'i tshe ko ta ka'i bu mo rab bzangs ma la stsogs pa/ dge slong ma bye ba 'bum phrag drug bcu thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa za ba dbang thob pa/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa
285b5(mdo): byas pa/ phur bor ba/ nyon mongs pa myed pa gtso bo chen po/ chen po stong pa nyid kyis rang kyi don thob pa shra sta ka ste/ 'di lta ste ko ta ka'i bu mo dge slong ma rab bzang ma dang dge slong ma nye dga'
285b6(mdo): mo dang / dge slong ma rgya mtsho bre gros dang / de dag las stsogs pa dA ge slong ma bye ma 'bum phrag drug/ snga dro'i nyi ma shar kar yan lag thams cad kyi ba spu rgya skyegs kyi shing gi me tog ltar rtsa dmar ba ni las
285b7(mdo): myig ni mchi ma khrag lta bus gang ste/ mchog du sdug bsngal ba'i chos dang ldan nas/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / snying brtse ba'i phyir dang / gdul bar bya bI dbang gi don tu theg pa chen po'i
285b8(mdo): mchog tu gsang ba/ stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dgongs pa'i tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyi chos kyi spro'i tshul bshad par bya ba'i phyir 'gro 'ad gra sa sashA/ ma kyi dam pa man thos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsu
285b9(mdo): bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// 'khor de na dge slong ma 'khod pa rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' myi mchog sa bcu thob pa sha
286a1(mdo): stag ste/ gdul ba'i dbang gyi phyir bud myed kyi gzugs dang / bud myed kyi dbyibs dang / sha dang phrag dang rgyus pa mang po dang / rus pa'i lus 'chang ba/ rtag tu tshad myed pa bzhin bsgo ba dang ldan pa
286a2(mdo): bdag nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi cho 'phrul chen po'i don byed nus pa sha stag go// gzhan yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtshos byin la stsogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed thams cad
286a3(mdo): kyang myi mchog sa bcu thob pa thabs kyis lus 'chang ba sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgya mtshos byin dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen blo gros myi zad pa dang / de
286a4(mdo): dag las stsogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyang theg po chen po thob par 'dod pa theg pa chen po la zhugs pa/ theg pa chen pos bkres pa/ theg pa chen po la sred pa/ theg
286a5(mdo): pa chen po la ser sna myed pa/ 'jig rten thams cad dang mthun bar byed nus pa sha stag dang // bdag cag rgal nas gzhan la rgas par bya'o snyam ste/ sngon gyi bskal pa bye ba snyed du/ tshul khrims kyi
286a6(mdo): bkod pa'i dam bca legs par blangs pa/ 'dzind pa'i spyad pa s+ho/ da pa sha stag dang / de bzhin du bdag cag krol nas gzhan grol babya'o snyam pa dang / de bzhin du dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung myi 'chad
286a7(mdo): par bya'o snyam pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o snyam pa dang / go cha chen po bgo par bya'o snyam du sems pa sha stag dang / de bzhin du yon tan dpag du myed pa dang ldan pa dang / bu cig pa la byis pa bzhin du sems
286a8(mdo): can thams cad la snyoms par lta ba sha stag ste/ de dag thams cad snga dro'i nyi ma 'char kar yan lag thams cad kyi ba sU rgya skyegs kyi shing gi mye tog ltar rtsa dmar ba ni langs myig ni 'chim phrag lta bus gang ste/ mchog tu stug
286a9(mdo): bsngal ba'i tshor ba dang ldan nas/ sems can thams cad la phar pa dang / bde ba dang / snying rtse ba'i phyir dang / gdul bar bya ba'i dbang gi don du theg pa chen po'i mchog tu gsang ba// stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dgongs pa'i
286b1(mdo): pa'i tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgo'i tshul bshad par bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ sngags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs sa phyag 'gro bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan 'bum bskor
286b2(mdo): ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das ka la ba de sogs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// yang de'i tshe bslab pa'i gzhi lnga blangs shing / tshul khrims dang cho ga dang / yon tan dang ldan pa'i dge bsnyen 'od dri ma
286b3(mdo): myed par grags pa'i rgyal po las stsogs pa dge snyen gang ga'i klung gnyis kyi bya ma snyed thams cad kyang zung dang zung du shes par 'dod pa sha stag ste/ sdug bsngal ba dang / bde ba dang / rtag pa dang / myi rtag pa dang / bdag yod pa dang /
286b4(mdo): bdag myed pa dang / stong pa dang / stong pa ma yin pa dang / de 'o nam yin pa dang / skyabs dang / skyabs ma yin pa dang / sems can dang / sems can myed pa dang / brtan pa dang / brtan pa ma yin pa dang /
286b5(mdo): zhi ba dang zhi ba ma yin pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas/ rang / ther zug dang / zer zug ma yin pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ma yin pa las stsogs pa'i byed par dang / khyad par du
286b6(mdo): 'phags pa shes par 'dod pa sha stag ste/ 'di lta ste dge bsnyen 'od dri ma myed par grags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / dge bsnyen rab sbyin la sa stsogs pa/ dge snyen theg pa chen po thob par 'dod pa/ thos nas
286b7(mdo): kyang gzhan dag la bstand par bya'o snyam du dam bcas shing tshul khrims blangs pa/ theg pa chen pos skom la ngoms nas kyang gzhan skom pa dag ngoms par bya'o snyam du dam bcas pa/ theg pa chen po la sred pa/ theg pa
286b8(mdo): chen po la ser sna myed pa/ 'jig rten thams cad dang 'thun par byed nus pa sha stag dang / bdag cag rgal nas gzhan bsgral bar bya'o// bdag cag krol nas gzhan dgrol bar bya'o// dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung
286b9(mdo): myi 'chad par bya'o// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o snyam du slob par 'dod pa go mchen po bsgos pa/ bslab pa rnams la sems gus pa dang / de bzhin du yon tan grangs myed pa dang ldan pa/ bu cig pa la bya ba bzhin
287a1(mdo): du sems can thams cad la snying rje dang ldan pa sha stag ste/ de dag kyang nyi ma 'char kar de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung zhugs la zhe nad pa'i phyir/ re res kyang tshan dan dang / e ka ru dang thar shing gyi mchog dang /
287a2(mdo): tsan dan sa mchog pa'i bud shing rnams dang / yam sreg shing dri gsung dang ldan pa yon tan lnga stong khyer de 'ongs so// de la yam sreg shing sA re zhing gser gyi skud pa rin po che sna bdun rigs dang ldan pas smras pas dkrigs pa/
287a3(mdo): ri mo la bris pa kho na bzhin du 'dug pa/ rang bzhin gyis gzhon sha can legs par bcos pa sha stag ste/ sA re zhing yang 'od rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i phung po chen po/ mdog sngo ba dang / bar bar kha cig tu mdog kar
287a4(mdo): cig tu sngo s+ya/ kha cig tu rtsa dmar/ kha cig tu ser ba/ myig tu sdug par bya ba sha stag ko/ bam po ri re'i g.yogs ma'i phyar bu yang rin po che sA pa dun las byas pa sha stag go// chings ma'i the ku mang po re re zhing yang
287a5(mdo): ldong ros kyi mdog lta bu dang / zar ma'i me tog gi mdog lta bu dang / sngon po dang ser po rnams kyis bar bar du spel da pa sha stag go// de la chings ma'i the gu mar po re rare bzhin yang gser thags kyi mchog
287a6(mdo): rnam par dag pa/ yul mang por grags pa dag gyis spe lang pa stag go// de la am sreg shing sA re zhing yang smos dri gsung zhim po dang / mye tog 'phreng dang / kur kum kyi phye ma dang ldan par byas pa/
287a7(mdo): gser thags kyis gsogs pa/ dar sngas brgyan pa rin po che sna bdun gyi shugs sngon po dang / ser po dang / sngo skya dang / dkar po dang / bcod ka lta bu dag gi nang du bcug pa/ sul ka ling ka'i ras dang / zar ma'i ras
287a8(mdo): dang / za ba dar dang / rgya dar gyi mchog rnams kyis dkris pa/ me tog mang pos brgyan pa/ byug po drim sung zhim po dag gyis byugs pa sha stag go// yam sreg shing sA re'i shing rta re re zhing rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan
287a9(mdo): gser gyim mdzes par byas pa 'acig lacig tu sdong po dang / dkar po dang / bab pa'i 'dog dang / sa kri'i ladog pas ldag pa'i 'od gsal ba dang ldan pa gsag ko// shing ta de dag gi gnyal gang rnams tu
287b1(mdo): rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa/ dpe' myed pa/ rkaNapa shes ma gyogs pa dag dang sbyard pa sha staka go// rta de dag kyang rlung ki shugs pas mgyogs pa// spug chu sbyar gyi mdog dang / sdong ros kyi mdog dang / sprin gyi
287b2(mdo): mdog can sha stag ste/ thabs de 'dra'i shing rta re re'i mdun logs dang / rgyab logs su rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng ste/ rgyal mtshan thams cad kyang rin po che las byas pa gser gyi dra bas g.yogs pa sha stag ko// rgyal
287b3(mdo): mtshan gyi mdun logs su yang gdugs rtsigs dang rtsa ba nor bu dri ma myed pa 'od can las byas pa mu tig chun pos sbyangs pa sha stag phyir ro// gdugs re re'i mdun logs su yang gser gyi mye tog ku mu ta dang / ud pa la
287b4(mdo): dang pad ma dkar po sdong bu byed dUr+ya las byas pa/ ze ba rdo rje las byas pa/ bung ba mang po skad 'byin pa/ dri ma srung zhim po dang ldan pa yid du 'ong ba/ 'od dang ldan pa/ che ba mang ba sha stag dang lnga ldi chen po
287b5(mdo): sha stag khyer ro// lnga ldi chen po rnams kyi mdun yang byang chub sem sa dpa'i skyes pa'i rabs kyi spyod pa ri mor bris pa chen po dag thog/ sa so// ri mo'i gzugs re re'i blo g.yas g.yon nas kyang smos
287b6(mdo): gar gyi gar thabs yul dbus nas byung ba rnam pa sna tshogs byed de/ gar thabs byed pa de'i nang na sil snyan rin po che las byas pa'i rdza rnga dang / 28rnga dang / rnga zlum dang / pi bar dang / gling bu dang / pi bar rgyud cig pa
287b7(mdo): dang / rnga bo che dang dung las stsogs pa dag rdung zhing 'bud do// kar thabs kyi sil snyan de dag las kyang kye ma 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba de lta bu'i rnam pa brjod cing gdung gdung skad du dbyangs lend to// kar thags
287b8(mdo): kyi sil snyan re re'i mudun tu yang mye tog dri zhim po sna tshogs rnam par 'tsher ba rnams kyi phye mas rin po che'i skon bu lags par bcos pa gzhon sha can dag bkang ba sha stag dang / de ma yin pa'i skon pu mar po blta na
287b9(mdo): stug pa gur gum gyi phye mas bkang ba sha stag thogs so// de dag gi mdun du yang bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi 'khor dang bcas pa khyab par 'gyur ba'i zhal zas phyir zhing 'dong ngo // zhal zas de dag kyang
288a1(mdo): bud shing tsan dan dmar po dang / a ka ru dang thang shing gi me chu dus bcos pa dang / kang ka'i klud kyi chus bcos pa sha stag ste/ skyur ba dang / lan tsa'i ro dang / dngar pa dang / bas ba dang / tsha ba dang / Sha b+hi/
288a2(mdo): ro dang ldan pa/ mdangs skyed pa phar par 'gyur ba sha stag go// sA la zung gi drung kyi nyer kor thams cad kyang ga ser gyi bye ma 'das pos bdal te/ ka pu sha'i ras dang snam bu dang / bcos sngam dang / dre'u rngog dang / ka la
288a3(mdo): ka'i ras dang / zab dang 'jam shing mdog dkar ba rnams kyang bting ngo // grub pa'i gnas de'i gzhi dpag tshad sum bcu rtsa gnyis lor 'or kyang kur kum gyis byugs so// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang ba
288a4(mdo): pa'i ser ge'i khri chen po gser las byas pa rin po che sA bdun gyis smras shing snang bar byas/ ri rab ltar che zhing 'phar mtho ba dag kya da bshams so// g.yogs a yang de dag kyi rkye nang du 'tshal bsha
288a5(mdo): stag kyis g.yogs te/ kaser gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i sgra sol li dang khrol shang gi smra 'byung ba'i dra ba can gyi yol ba rnams kyis bskord rgya dar sma stug uka phyim chen po'i bla re rnams ni bris/ gdugs
288a6(mdo): dkar po rnams kyis ni nyi chen bsgribs/ rdza sab dkar po rnams kyis ni ga sabs/ rgyab rten glang po'i mche ba la chu srin ma kar rten pa'i 'a nas zla ba nya ba'i 'od zer ltar dkar ba'i mu tig chun po 'byung zhing sbyangs
288a7(mdo): pa dang ldan pa rnams ni bcas/ sa phyogs rnams ni mye tog dri zhim po'i sil mas gtor ro// dge snyen de dka re re nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te bdag gis sems can thams cad la zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas
288a8(mdo): sbyin no// skom 'dod pa rnams la mi sgom sbyin no// mgo dang myig las sogs pa yan laka dang nyer laka thams cad 'dod pa rnams la yang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sbyin no// dbul po dang bkren pa pa dang pos
288a9(mdo): ba pa rnams la yang 'dod pa dang duka dang gnod pa/ ma brtags pa'i spyor pa rnams la gtogs par gang dang kang dag ci dang ci 'dod pa pa de dang de dag rog par sbyar ro// snyam du sems kyi kazhan ni ci sang kyi sems sod/
288b1(mdo): de bzhin du dge snyen gyi sde tshan byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa de dag thams cad kyis bsams pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag gi bshos gsol te yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa
288b2(mdo): bdag gi bshos gsol te yongs su mya ngan las 'dra bar bya'o snyam ste/ se so nas de 'ba' shig snying la sems shing / san lag thams cad kyi ba spu rgya skyegs kyi shing gi me tog ltar rtsa dmar ba ni langs/ myig ni mchi ma phrag
288b3(mdo): lta bus gang ste/ mchog tu sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba dang ldan nas/ rang rang gi mchod pa'i so byad bud shing dang / sam sreg shing dang / shing rta dang / rgyal mtshan dang / gdugs dang / ba dan rnams dang chas te/ zhal zas kyi
288b4(mdo): mchog kyis sbyard pa'i snod rnams thog nas// bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos bya ga 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la spos dang mye tog dang 'phreng ba dang
288b5(mdo): phye ma dang / phye ma zhi bu dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba da na dang / bla re rgya chen po dag gis mchod nas lan 'bum bskor ba byas te/ myig nas mchi ma rgyun myi chad par char bzhin du bab nas
288b6(mdo): bdag nyid la sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa mang po byed cing / kye ma 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur ro// zhes de skad du skad chen po 'don te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung na srog chags shing shu ma ru
288b7(mdo): bzhin du 'gre ldog cing gsol ba 'debs te// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi 'khor dang bcas pas/ bdag gis sbyard pa'i bshos gsol bar ci gnang / bcom ldan 'das bdag la
288b8(mdo): thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ sbyin pa'i tha ma de bzhin gshegs pas bzhes su gsol zhes gsol ba 'debs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyend pa bzhin du cang myi gsung bar gyur to// de dag gis
288b9(mdo): lan gnyis lan gsum du de skad ces gsol kyang / lar gnyis lan gsum du bcom ldan 'das cad myi gsung bar 'gyur to// de nas dge bsnyen gyi tshogs de dag re thag chad de cang myi zer bar 'khod nas/ bu cig pa shi nas
289a1(mdo): dur khrod du bor ma thag pa'i pha ma 'gre ldog pa bzhin du sdug bsngal bar gyur to// de bzhin du dge snyen de dag thams cad mchog tu sdug bsngal bar gyur pa las la ras te/ rang rang gyi mchod pa'i yo byar
289a2(mdo): rnams bsdus nas phyogs gcig tu 'dod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe bslab pa'i gzhi lnga blangs shing / tshul khrims dang mchog dang yon tan dang ldan pa dang / dam pa'i chos kyi gces pa 'dzind pa'i dge snyen mchod dang
289a3(mdo): kyi bu mo 'tshe ba'i dpal sogs pa dge bsnyen ma gang ka'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed thams cad kyang / bud byed kyi gzugs kyis sems can bye ba phrag mang po nges par sgrol ba khyim myi gnas la spod pa sha sag ste/ lus 'di cid
289a4(mdo): nyes pa'i khams brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi las lpags pas bsdus pa'o// lus 'di ni srin bu'i rigs bye ba phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi'i zas so// lu sa 'di ni rgyal po'i khri mor du brubs pa'i dri ma rnam pa'o// lus 'di ni/
289a5(mdo): khyi ro ruld pa'i dri bas kyang lpags par spags pa'o// lus 'di/ ni sgo dgu nas myi gtsang ba 'dzag pa'o// lus 'di ni sha dang chu ba dang / rus pa dang phrag dang pags pa'i zhal zhal can/ rka lag gi phyi sgo
289a6(mdo): dang / ra ba dang ba gam dang / myig gi skar zhung can/ 'go bo'i yang thog can/ yid rgyal po'i lte bu'i pho brang grong khyer lta bu'o// lus 'di ni mkhas pa thams cad kyis spangs shing byis pa'i skye bo dga' bar
289a7(mdo): byed pa'i 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang ga ti mug las stsogs pa'i nyon mongs pa bye ma snyed kyi srin pos bsnyen pa/ 'dam bu dang / e ne da dang / dbu ba dang chu shing lta bu ra snying po myed pa/ klog dang / ri gzar po'i 'bab chu'i/
289a8(mdo): rlabs ltar shi nad tu myi brtan pa'o// sgyu ma dang smyig rgyu dang / brag cha dang / zla ba'i gzugs brnyan ltar slu bar byed pa/ rlung shugs drag pos rnam par dkrugs po'i chu'i shugs kyis brkos pa'i 'gram gyi sdong po ltar
289a9(mdo): g.yangs na 'dug pa'i chos can/ spyad byi deng wa dang bya rgod dang bya rog rnams kyi zas yin na/ su zhig 'di lta bu 'chang ba la dka' bar byed/ rgya mtsho'i chu thams cad skra'i rtse mas blangs te/ ba glar gyi rgyaka rjes su
289b1(mdo): krugs par ni nus srid kyi/ lus nang bzhi brgyabam bzhis gzir ba 'di snying po myed pa 'am/ myi gtsang bani cig cam gyis bstand par myi nus so// sa chen po 'di rgya shug gi 'bras bu'i rus pa'i 'brutsa ma sha stag tu
289b2(mdo): byas pa 'am/ yungs 'bru tsam/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul tsam sha stag tu byas pa ni zad par 'gyur yang srid kyi/ lus 'di yod kyi bar du 'di'i nyes dmyigs ni mthar thug par myi 'gyur te/ de bas ma dam pa'i chos bsrung ba'i
289b3(mdo): phyir 'di mchil ma bzhin du bor bar bya snyam ste/ 'di ltar dge bsnyen ma de dag thams cad rin po che stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa bsgoms pas/ sems bsgoms pa sha stag ste/ 'di ste/
289b4(mdo): ste/ dge bsnyen ma 'tsho ba'i dpal zhes bya ba dang / dge snyen ma dpal 'phreng zhes bya ba dang / dge snyen ma sa ga zhes bya ba dang / de las so gas pa theg pa chen po thos par 'dod pa/ thos nas kyang gzhan dag
289b5(mdo): la bstand par bya'o snyam du dam bca' ba/ bsrung ba lhur lend/ pa/ bud myed kyi lus ngan no snyam du smod pa dang / lus snying po mye/ da do snyam du smod pa/ se so nas shas cher skom pa dang / 'khor
289b6(mdo): ba'i 'khor lo bzhig ko snyam du sems pa sha stag dang / theg pa chen pos skom la/ ngoms nas kyang gzhan skom pa dag ngoms pa bya'o snyam du dam bcas pa sha stag dang / theg pa chen po la sred pa
289b7(mdo): theg pa chen po la ser sna myed pa/ 'jig rten thams cad dang mthun par slob par 'dod pa dang / grol nas gzhan dgrol bar bya'o// rgal nas gzhan bsgral bar bya'o// dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung myi 'chad par
289b8(mdo): bya'o// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o snyam du slob par 'dod pa sha stag dang / go cha chen po bgos pa/ bslab pa rnams la brtul zhugs brtan pa dang / de bzhin du yon tan du dang ldan pa dang / bu cig pa la
289b9(mdo): bya ba bzhin du sems can thams cad la snying rje dang ldan pa sha stag dang / de dag kyang nyi ma 'char kar shi nad tu rings par gcig la gcig 'jus te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung zhugs la bzhen pa'i phyir yam sreg
290a1(mdo): shing dge bsnyen pa rnams kyi nyis 'gyur byer ba las bcom ldan 'das kyis zhas zas ma zhes nas/ bu shi ba bzhin du mchog tu sdug bsngal bar gyur to// dus nas langs te phyogs gcig tu 'bod do//
290a2(mdo): gzhan yar de'i tshe le tsa byi gzhon nu gtsang ma dri ma byed pa nga po las stsogs pa g.yangs pa can na gnas pa 'i byi gzhon nu grong khyer ki nang na gnas pa dang / phyi rol na gnas pa dang bcas pa rnams dang / 'tsham bu gling na
290a3(mdo): gnas pa'i rgyal phran/ blon po dang bcas pa'i gar 'ga'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed thams cad dang / dam pa'i chos bsrung ba la mkhas pa/ tshul khrims dang / cho ga dang / yon tan dang ldan pa dam pa'i chos sun 'byin cing rtags can
290a4(mdo): 'chal pa rnams kyi ser ba lta bur gyur da pa sha stag la/ de dag thams cad kyang 'di lta bur 'dod da/ bdag cag gi nor dang / 'bru'i tshogs dang / mdzod dang bar ba'i tshogs gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni bdud rtsi myi zad par
290a5(mdo): bya ba dang / bdud rtsis gnas par bya ba'i phyir yin gyis/ bdag/ cag kis dam pa'i chos la nan tan bya'o// dam pa'i chos sun 'byi/ na cing log par lta ba rnams kyi lce bcad par bya'o// zhes legs pa
290a6(mdo): dam bcas pa/ tshul khrims 'chal pa tshul la myi gnas pa rnams ni gos dkar po gyon du bcug ste/ khyim pa'i las byed du gzhug go snyam du sems brtul pa/ dam pa'i chos sdug pa la ni bla ma bzhin
290a7(mdo): rim 'gro bya'o dam bcas pa/ dge 'dun la phan pa dang / bde bar gnas par bya ba ni yongs su rdzogs par byas dang / des chog go snyam du sems pa dang / theg pa chen po thos par 'dod la/ thos nas kyang gzhan dag la
290a8(mdo): bstan par bya'o// snyam du yi dam bcas pa la btang ba dang / de las stsogs pa'i yon tan dpag tu myed pa dang ldan pa sha stag ste/ 'di lta ste l-i tsa bi gzhon mu gtsang ma dri ma myed pa'i snying po zhes bya ba dang / bsgrib pa dag
290a9(mdo): zhes bya ba dang / gang ga'i chu drim myed pas byir ba zhes bya ba dang / de las sogs pa li Ta byi gzhon nu de dag kyang gcig la gcig 'jus te/ re res kyang gdung zhugs la bzhen pa'i phreng shing thang shing gi mchog dang / car ngan dang /
290b1(mdo): a ru ru rnams dang / sam sreg shing bye ba phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi dang / mchod pa snga ma'i nyis 'gyur rnams khyer nas mchod pa rnams bsgrags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thang du dong ngo // litsa byi ka zhon nu re re zhing sa paglang poche
290b2(mdo): brgyad zhi ba'i stong dang / rta brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / shing rta brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / nor bu chu shel brgyad bri ba'i stong dang chas so// glang po me re re'i ma dun tu yang che ba la 'os pa'i gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang da
290b3(mdo): kyi bla re chen po rnams thogs so// gdugs rnams kyi nang na thung ngu gang yin pa de la yang khor khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod do// dar gyi bla re chen po rnams kyi nang na chung ngu gang yin pa de la yang chu zhedu du dpag tshad sum
290b4(mdo): bcu rtsa gnyis yod do// rgyal mtshan rnams kyi rang na thung du gang sim ba de la yang 'phang tu dpag tshad brgya yod do// ba ran rnams kyi nang na tha dug pa yi ra ba de kyang dpag tshad stong du phyi nang to// de ltar de dag mchod pa/
290b5(mdo): rnams dang chas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thar du donganas/ @coM/ ma ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ zhes zas phul bas bcom ldan 'das cad myi gsung ste ma bzhes nas/ mcho
290b6(mdo): tu mug bsngal bar 'gyur te/ re bas ca nas sangs te/ ldan 'das kyis nus tas bdu sum gyis srid tsam du 'phagasango // gzhan srung de'i tshe 'angs bu gling ba'i blo bo dang / tshong dpon/
290b7(mdo): dang kyim bdag gang ga'i lnga'i bye sa snyed thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la dad pa/ nus khrims dang chog dang yon tan rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa/ dam pa'i chos sum 'byin pa rnams kyi ser sa lta bur gyu
290b8(mdo): bsha stag ste/ 'di lta / nga/ gi rgyal po rnam par snang byed ces bya ba dang / 'gro ba skyong zhes bya ba dang / chos skyong zhes bya ba dang / de la tshogs pa dag kyang de'i rje de lkugs te/ de dag thams cad kyang ra
290b9(mdo): rab gi mchod pas mchod pa snga ma rnams zild kyis mnan nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa chen po'i tshogs kyis mchod nas zhal zas ma bzhes pa'i phyir mchog tu lug bsngal bar gyur da te/
291a1(mdo): zag chad nas langs pa te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus te sa bdun kyi srid tsam du 'phags te 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe rgyal po ma skyes smra ma gtogs par/ yangs pa can gyi rgyal po/
291a2(mdo): zla ba dri ma myed pa'i snying po grong khyer gyi nang na gnas pa dang / phyi rol da na gnas pa'i g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa las stsogs pa/ 'dzam bu gling thams cad kyi grong khyer dang / ri khrod kyi grong dang yul chen po dang /
291a3(mdo): lungs kyi rgyal po gang ka'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed dang lhan cig tu dpung gi tshogs yan laka bzhi dang bcas te sbags so// rgyal po de rnams re re la yang dmaka 'brug yas phrag bco brgyad yod do// de dag la glang po me rtag
291a4(mdo): tu 'gram pa nas dngul 'dzag pa dag dang / rta rlung gyi shugs pas lpag bar mgyogs pa dag kyang yod do// de dag gi mchod pa'i yo byad gang yin pa de dag kyang mchod pa'i yo byad snga ma de dag las nyis 'gyur
291a5(mdo): kyis ches bzang ba ches mang ste/ de lta bu'i mchod pa'i phul dag/ khyem nas/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang chas te lhags so/ de dag gi mchod pa de rnams kyi nang na gdugs chung ngu gang yin pa de swa
291a6(mdo): dpag chad brgyad cu zheng kab par 'dug go// ba ran gyi nang na mu du ka ba yin pas kyang dpag tshad brgyad stong du phyin to// rgyal mtshan phal pa gang yin pa de la yang 'bar du dpag tshad sum bcu yong ngo // de ltar yAn
291a7(mdo): pa can gyi rgyal po zla ba drim myed pa'i snying po dang / nyi 'od ces bya ba dang / de las sogs pa rgyal po rnams nyi ma 'char kar sngags te/ de dag kyang dam pa'i chos sun 'byin cing rtag chad 'chal pa rnams kyi ser ba su
291a8(mdo): bur gyur pa/ mthus kyang sems can rnams dam pa'i chos la 'god par byed pa dang / bdag cag gi nor dang / 'bru'i tshogs dang / mdzod dbabang ba'i tshogs gang yin pa de dag ni ngem pa'i chos gnas par bya ba'i phyir ro//
291a9(mdo): snyam du sems pa sha stag dang / bdag cag gis dam pa'i chos la nan tan bya'o// dam pa'i chos sur 'byin pa rnams kyi sde ni drungs nas bcad do zhes dam bcas pa brtan por byas pa sha stag dang / theg pa chen po 'dod pa dang /
291b1(mdo): 'jig rten thams cadas snying ce pa ga stag ste/ de dag gi mthod pa nabs kyis sangs pa can nas grong byer ku shi'i bar thams cad kun tu gang bar gyur to// de dag gi gdugs kyi 'grib ma 'dab chags su 'dug pas min
291b2(mdo): khyod kyis myi phog go// dedag sa kyi gsung kyis ning bkrar bani dakhyab par gyur te/ de dag kris bcos sun 'das la dab nga gis sbyar du ba'i rnalabs pa'is pa sa dganyis lan gsum gyi bar du gamo
291b3(mdo): btab kyang zhal bas ma bzhes nas yid kyi dga' ste/ sangs nas phyogs gcig tu 'khong ngo // kanan yang de'i tshe rgyal po ma skyes smra'i btsun mo ma gtogs par sangs pa can gyi rgyal po btsun mo 'jig rten gsum mamadzes
291b4(mdo): ma las sogs pa/ 'dzam bu gling pa'i rgyal po dang / tshong dpon dang khyim bdag rnams kyi chung ma gang ka'i klung bdun gyi bye mo snyed dang / sman tsog tu lpags te/ de dag thams cad kyang bud myed kyi gzugs kyis
291b5(mdo): sems can mang po nges par sgrol pa/ rtag tu lus bsgom pa dang na ba/ chen po stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pas sems rnam par dag pa sha staka ste/ 'di lta ste yangs
291b6(mdo): pa can gyi rgyal po'i btsun mo 'jig rten gsum na mdzes ma zhes bya ba dang / btsun mo pri yang ku zhes bya ba dang / de las stsogs pa thams cad kyang sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin
291b7(mdo): du snying rje dang ldan pa sha stag ste/ gcig la gcig 'jus nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung zhugs la zhe nad pa'i phyir/ yam sreg shing rnams khyer te/ mchod pa snga ma thams cad rang rang gi mchod pa rnams kyis zil kyis
291b8(mdo): mnan nas/ bcom ldan 'das la nyis 'gyur tu mchod pa byas te// de dag gi mchod pa'i yo byad rnams kyi rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gdugs rnams kyi 'phang dang / chu zheng ki tshad kyang snga ma'i nyis 'gyur pas
291b9(mdo): lhag go// kha zas rnams kyi dri bsung ni dpag tshad brgyad du khyab par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ zhal zas bzhes par gsol ba btab kyang zhal zas ma bzhes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
292a1(mdo): bskor ba byed cing skra 'bal la/ rang rang gi rgyan rnams 'thor zhing skad myi snyan pas dus ste/ bu gcig pa shi ba bzhin du stug bsngal bar gyur da nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus sa la zur gyi drung nyid du phyogs/
292a2(mdo): gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe lho 'u myig yangs shes bya ba las stsogs pa/ lha'i tshogs gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang lhan cig tu lpags nas/ lha de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po dag ltos
292a3(mdo): grogs po dag ltos kyi rnams kyi mchod pa'i yo byad mchog tu khyad par 'phags la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchod pa dang bkur sti thams mchod par 'dod do//
292a4(mdo): rnams kyi zhal zas kyi tha mas bzhes pa'i phyir ro// bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs kyis/ grogs po dag bdag cag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
292a5(mdo): rgyas la so so nas mchod pa bya zhing tha ma'i dus du zhal zas dbul bar bya na/ ji ltar bdag cag gis phul ba'i zhal zas de bzhin gshegs pas gsol te/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar
292a6(mdo): gshegs pas mdzad ci gu grogs po dag sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni dkon no// de bas kyang zhal zas kyis tha ma'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa phun sum tshogs pa ni ches dkon no// kye ma bcom
292a7(mdo): ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das na ni 'jig rten stongs par 'gyur ro zhes smras so// lha de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po thob par 'dod la thos nas kyang gzhan dag la bstan to snyam du dam bcas pa/ theg
292a8(mdo): pa chen pos sgom la ngoms kyang gzhan skom pa rnams ngoms par bya'o snyam du dam bcas pa/ theg pa chen po la sred pa/ theg pa chen po la ser sna myed pa/ theg pa chen po la phrag dog dang dus che ba dang / 'chab
292a9(mdo): pa dang / spu myed pa dang / theg pa chen po sun 'byin pa'i sems can rnams kyi ser ba lta bur gyur pa/ dam pa'i chos bsrung ba'i tshul khrims blangs pa/ 'jig rten dang mthun par slob par 'dod pa bdag cag
292b1(mdo): gal nas gzhan sbal bar bya'o// bdug cag grol nas gzhan grol bar bya'o// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o// dkon mchog gsum gi gdung kyi 'chad par bya'o snyam du slob par 'dod pa/ go cha chen po bkos
292b2(mdo): bslab pa rnams la dam bcas pa brtson pa dang / de bzhin du yon tam dpag tu myed pa dang ldang bu cig pa la bya ba bzhin du 'jig rten thams cad la snying rjes lta ba sha stag ste/ de dag kyang nyi ma 'char kar stan pa sngos
292b3(mdo): su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i gdung zhugs la bzhen pa'i phyir/ bud shing dang sam sreg shing rnams khyer te/ de dag kyang snga mas phul ba'i lam sreg shing gyi nyes gyur pas bzang ba'i lha rnams dri gsung dang ldan pa yid
292b4(mdo): du 'ong pa la dkon pa sha stag go// shing rta yang rta'i mchog/ ma gyogs pa dag dang sbyard pa/ dar la dkar pos kayogs pa gzu gas dang dbyibs ri mor brir yang myi nus pa dril bu ga yar ka'i dra ba nA
292b5(mdo): gyi yol bas bskor ba/ dar yug khyis chen po'i bla re rgya chen po/ rtsa ba ri mo can dag la bcugs pa dang / kar thabs dang rol mo/ yid du 'ong ba rnams kyis mdun tu drangs pa/ kha zas zhim po ma
292b6(mdo): po dag dang / ser ge'i khri bye du r+ya'i rgyab rten rtse me nor bu'i 'od kyis snang bar byas pa/ zhabs rten gser las byas pa dag kyang bshams pa dang / sa phyogs kyang mye tog dri bsung zhim po snga tshogs kyis mdze
292b7(mdo): par byas la/ me tog gi sil ma bkram zhing bkod pa/ dpung gi tsho gas yan lag bzhi phyi bzhin 'brang ba sha stag ste/ so so nas mchi ma khrag tu myi thub cing / mchog tu sdug bsngal bas gdungs nas sems can thams
292b8(mdo): cad la phan pa dang bde ba dang / snying rtse ba'i phyir dang / gdul bar bya ba'i dbar gyi don tu theg pa chen po'i mchog tu gsang ba nyid kyi rnam par dgongs pa'i tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyi chos kyi sgo'i tshul bshad par bya ba'i phyin
292b9(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyi 'bas la 'go bos phyag 'tshal nas mchod po dang / bkur sti'i mchog nam pa mang po dag byas te/ bskor ba yang byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor rnams kyi phyir rang rang gi bla gos pa sa
293a1(mdo): bting ste/ rang rang gi rgyan rnams phog cing gtor nas/ rang rang gi skra 'phel zhing skad 'amyi snyan pas du ste/ bcom ldan 'das la tshig 'thun par 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag
293a2(mdo): gis sbyar pa'i bshos gsol da te/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mdzad du gsol zhes lan gnyis lan gsum du gsol ba btab kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis ma bzhes te cang myi gsung nas de dag re thag chad de langs
293a3(mdo): nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po phyogs bzhin gnas pa klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu dang / dka' bo dang / nye dga' bo las stsogs pa klu'i rgyal po gang ka'i klung dgu'i bye ma snyed shi nad tu ris
293a4(mdo): par nyi ma 'char kar lha rnams kyi mchod pa las kyang nyis gyur da las lha/ dag pa'i mchod pa'i yo byad rang rang gi 'byor da pa dang 'tsham pa dag khyer nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thar du dong ste/ phyag 'tshal nas zhal zas ban+de
293a5(mdo): par gsol ba btab kyang bsam pa bzhin du ma grub nas langs te/ phyogs cig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe rnam thos kyi bu las/ stsogs pa gnod sbyin gyi bdag po g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa gang ga'i
293a6(mdo): klung bcu'i bye ma snyed cig la gcig 'jus nas/ rang rang mchod pa rnam sa kyis klu'i rgyal po rnams kyi mchod pa snga ma zil kyis mnan nas cho ga sa chen po dang chus trAM/ lpags nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal/
293a7(mdo): te/ zhal zas bzhes par gsol ba btab kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal zas ma bzhes nas yid myi dka' ste langs nas phyogs cig tu 'bod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe nam mkha' lding gi bdag po dgra'i mdza' bo zhes
293a8(mdo): bya ba las stsogs pa nas mkha' lding ki rgyal po kang ka'i klung nyi shu'i bye ma snyed kyis rang gi mchod pas gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po snga ma dag gi mchod pa rnams zil gyis mnan nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ zhal zas bzhes
293a9(mdo): par gsol ba btab kyang zhal zas ma bzhes nas yid kyi dga' ste yangs nas phyogs gcig tu 'bod do// gzhan yang de'i dri ba'i bdag po myos byin gyi bu las phrogs pa'i dri ba'i bdag po gang ka'i klung sum bu'i bye ba snyed
293b1(mdo): kyis mchod pa snga ma thams cad pas kyang ches mchog tu gyurd pa'i mchod pa rnams phyir de 'ongs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas te rol mo snyam dgu byas nas phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhal zas
293b2(mdo): bzhes par gsol ba btab kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ma bzhes nas de dag kyang yid myi dga' bar gyur da te/ langs nas phyogs gcig tu 'phod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe myi 'am ci'i bdag po legs mthong las stsogs
293b3(mdo): pa myi 'am ci'i bdag po gang ka'i klung bzhi bcu'i bye ma snyed lhags te/ snga ma rnams kyi mchod pa de dag bsdoms pa pas kyang / de dag re re'i mchod pa ches khyad pa ru d+ha 'phags par gyur da to// de dag kyang zhal zas ma bar+tha/
293b4(mdo): nas yid myi dka' bar gyur da te/ phyogs gcig tu 'bod do// gzhan yang de'i lto 'phye chen po'i bdag po legs mthong chen po las stsogs pa/ lto 'phye chen po'i bdag po kang ka'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis
293b5(mdo): mchod pa snga ma'i nyis 'gyur gyur pa las/ snga ma bzhin du zhal zas ma bzhes nas yid myi dka' ste/ phyogs gcig tu 'phod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe lha ma yin kyi bdag po bde mchog rigs las stsog/
293b6(mdo): pa/ lha ma yin gyi bdag po gang ka'i klang drug cu'i bye ma snyed lus che zhing snang ba chen po dang ldan zhing lha ma yin gyi bsam pa myed pa sha stag kyis mchod pa snga ma'i nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur gyi mchod pa dag phyir te 'ongs te
293b7(mdo): bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas zhal zas ma bzhes te yid kyi dga' bar gyur danas/ langs te shing sa la zung gi drung du rang rang gi mi byin gyis sdang bar byas ste 'khod do// ga'am yang de'i tshe sbyir byed ma'i bu'i bdag po
293b8(mdo): ka ru ka'i chu'i dri ma myed pa rjes byin las stsogs pa sbyin byed ma'i bu gang ga'i bdun bcu'i bye ma snyed lus che zhing snang ba chen po dang ldan pa sbyin byed ma'i bu'i bsam pa myed pa sha stag gis mchod pa snga ma thams cad las
293b9(mdo): mchod pa nyis gyur da nyis gyurd pas bzang ba dag khyer ba las snga ma bzhin du zhal zas la bzhes nas yid kyi dga' bar gyur da te shing sa la zung gi drung du rang rang gyi gi gzi brjid kyis sdang bar byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'od
294a1(mdo): kun na yang de'i srin po'i bdag po 'jig byed las srogasu pa skyin po'i dbang po kung klu'i klung brkyad na'i bye ma snyed srin po'i bsam paskyed pa sha stag kyis ka'i brjid chen po'i tshogs kyis sa la zung gi drung du snang bar
294a2(mdo): byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'a'od do// gzhan yang de'i tshe 'bras bu'i shing ki bdag po dri srel las stsogs pa/ 'bras bu'i shing gi bdag po kang ga'i klung dgu bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis snga
294a3(mdo): ma'i mchod pa thams cad las nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur gyis lhag pa'i mchod pa'i tshogs khyem nas/ zhu phyug po rgyags pa rnams dang bung ba rnams skad 'byin pa dang ldan pa'i me tog 'tshar ba'i khri shing mang po'i dog pa dang / lo sa
294a4(mdo): 'brus pa rnams kyis swa phyoklas rgyun te phyogs gcig tu 'bod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe rigs sngags 'char kyi rgyal po spu 'phrul chen po las stsogs pa/ rigs sngags 'char gyi rgyal po gang ka'i stong
294a5(mdo): rgyal po gang ka'i stod gyi bye ma snyed kyis mchod pa snga ma'i nyis 'gyur/ pas lhag pa'i mchod pa dag khyer nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ gzhan yang de'i tshe lha mo 'dod dra rgyur sbyar ba'i gzugs can legs
294a6(mdo): mthor ma las stsogs pa'i gang ga'i klung bya ba'i bye ma snyed kyis yangs pa can gyi rgyal po'i btsun mo'i mchod pa nyis gyur pas lhag pa dag phyir te rang rang gi rgyan rnams/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyad sngar sa la spungs
294a7(mdo): nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe lha'i bu mo rab ma dang su wa shi las sogs pa lnga'i bu mo ka ka'i klung bye lan kyi da po pa'i nyis kyur du nyis gyur du pas rjes lhag par yang zhing sa ba dag gis mdus tu
294a8(mdo): drangs te snga ma bzhin du phyogs gcig tu 'a'od do// kazhan yang de'i tshe 'thung po'i tshogs pa ba sangs ltar 'khor ba zhes bya ba las sogs pa gang ga'i klung byes zag spyod kyi bye ma snyed snga ma bzhin du phyogs cig tu 'bod
294a9(mdo): do// gzham yang de'i tshe 'jig rten spyod pa bzhi sgra'i bu gang ka'i klung bye ba phrag 'bum dang lhan gcig tu mchod pa snga ma'i gnyis 'grum gnyis 'gyur pas spag pa dag phyi nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'chas nyen
294b1(mdo): byas ma bzhes nas sA ma bzhin du phyogs cig tu 'a'od do// gzhanayang de'i kyi rlungs ba'idun nung gtong ba'i lpag ka'i klung bye ba zag 'bus dang lhan cig tu dus ma yin pams bshing sdon pa dang khri shing dang zhing byes pa
294b2(mdo): rangasags rnams dang / skyes raba'i tog kyi ni zhidi dang kyi rgyarnams kyis ma phyogs brgyan dpar byed ci nam tham sa cad kyime tog kyi ngas rnam sa phyogs za rgyas par byedas lol la 'bras pa ca dmar
294b3(mdo): rnams kyis shing sa la bur nyi ma 'char ka'i 'od zer ser po nor kAr 'dug pa bzhin du byas nas mchod pa snga ma'i nyis gyur dbus lhas pa'i mchod pa dag myer te// bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas snga ma 'dzin
294b4(mdo): du shing sa la zub kyi drung du 'dod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe char pa 'bra bas pa'i sgra gang ka'i klung gi ma snyed sprin chen po dang rtswa sbyar rnam sa phyi bzhin 'brang zhing klog 'gyu ba'i gseb nas/ ma bya'i mchin
294b5(mdo): ltar mdog sngo ba'i char gyi rgun 'bab la 'brug sma dal nas grogs pa'i sprin dang ldan pas char zim bu bsil ba dang 'dres pa'i me tog/ gyi char 'phebs shing / bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te zhal
294b6(mdo): zas ma bzhes nas re thag cad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung zhug sa la zhen pa'i me gsad pa'i phyir nam mtha' nyid la 'phod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe spos kyi glang po sgra gcan dang lus dang mdog dang sbrang rtsi mdog
294b7(mdo): mer dang / 'dod dgu'i spos ldan las sogs pa spos kyi glang po gang ka'i klung nyi shu'i bye ma snyed theg pa chen po 'dod pa sha stag gis ston dpa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyir gangs kyi sman dang / pad ma'i rtsi dang sdong
294b8(mdo): bu shing rta chen po'i phar lo tsam sha stag dang / dkon pa chen po dag nas par ma dang ud pa la dang ku su ra dang / pad ma dkar po dang / rtsa ba dang / 'bras bu dang / rdo gu sA tha dad pa du ma dag snga'i thor tos phyung zhing khyer te
294b9(mdo): rlung ki shugs pas kyang ches ma gyogs pa dang / shin tu rings par dbyar kyi 'brug smra bzhin du sgrogs shing lpags nas/ pad ma'i 'dab ma bcer pa'i seng ge'i khri 'i lnga ldi dag bshams te/ bcom ldan 'das la
295a1(mdo): mchod pa byas nas zhal zas ma zhes pas re thag chad de phyogs cig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe seng ge smra spogs zhes bya ba las stsogs pa ser ge ga' ga'i klung sum bcu'i bye ma snyad sems can thos/
295a2(mdo): cad la myi 'jigs pa sbyin pa sha stag gis seng ge'i rtsal chen pos spos kyi glang po che rnams dang 'dra bar mye tog dang 'bras bu rnams phyar te rings par lhags nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gzhan yang de'i cha bya ngang pa dang zhung
295a3(mdo): zung dang dur pa dang ka dam pa dang / zal mo dang / gzhan dang / zhu byug dang / ba l+li ka dang / ka la bying ka dang / shar shang de'u las stsogs pas kyang spos kyi glang po chen rnams dang 'dra bar me tog dang 'bras bu phyir te rang
295a4(mdo): rab kyi skad phyung nas phyogs gcig tu 'bod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe sa'i steng na ba dang ma he mo dang / ra ma mo yod de cog nu ma 'o mas bkang ste shin tu rings par spags nas shing sa la zung kyi drung gis phyogs
295a5(mdo): gshong shig mthong nas der rang rang gis nu ma 'o ma sa gang ba de dag/ las 'o ma gseg ma dang / bye ma dang ba tshas ma 'gags shing / tsha ba'i skyon du 'gyur ba myed pa dag gzags ste/ 'o ma de dag kyi
295a6(mdo): nang nas sbrang bu dag bsal nas phyogs gcig tu 'bod do// kan na yang de'i tshe drang srong bzod par smra ba las stsogs pa gling bzhin pa/ nas pa'i drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ theg pa chen po
295a7(mdo): 'dod pa sha sngags/ gang ka'i klung dkrigs kyi bye ma snyed rang rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis yas sreg shing dpa zhal zas dag khyer nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'bod do// gzhan yang de sa
295a8(mdo): 'od srung chen po las stsogs pa dge slong kyi dge 'dun la cig dang / gnas brtan kun dga' bo las stsogs pa ma gtogs par/ yul phyogs na kunas pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma ji snyed yod pa de dag thams
295a9(mdo): cad ma sus par deng spags so// gzhan yang de'i tshe ri rab las sogs pa rin pa mi rnams dang / 'jig rten kyi bar 'tsha gang ka'i klung grangs myed pa'i bye ma snyed kyang / shing ljon pa dang / bri shing mang po nyi ma tshan gyi gribs
295b1(mdo): myed pa dang / zug zung lag krib ma che ba/ zug kha nas 'bab pa'i chus gdu ba dang / sad ga zhong ro gu rung su ba dang / 'bras bus kang ba dag kyang de lpags so// lba'i bu ma tso po che'i mdun ma chen po dag kyang mi ba dang #
295b2(mdo): te/ mchod pa'i phyir lpags nas// bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// kanan yang de'i tshe skra'i bu'i mthu bo che 'od chen po/ rgyal mche chen po bzhi'i nang na gnas pa dang / chu klung chen
295b3(mdo): po dag gi nang na gnas pa dang / kang ka'i klung grangs myed pa'i bye ma snyed mchod pa snga sa pas nyis gyur kyis mdzes pa'i mchod pa sdom tu btang nas nyi ma'i 'od kyis mar mye'i 'od zil gyis mnan pa bzhin mur ba rang gi 'od
295b4(mdo): nyi ma'i 'od zil kyis mnan te/ nyi ma 'char ka'i 'od kyis shing mya ran 'tshad kyi lo ma thams cad dmar lam mer snang bar byed pa bzhin du rang rang gi 'od kyis chu klung gser ldan gi chu dmar lam mer snang bar
295b5(mdo): byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te phyag 'tshal te phyo gas gcig tu 'phod do// gzhan yang de'i tshe grong phyer ku shi nas shi/ nga sa la zur gyi drung gyi bar skabs kyi bar snang la khang bzangs ri'i dab
295b6(mdo): po'i rtse mo lta bu/ ngang pa'i thal kong ltar dkar ba sha stag gis 'khrig sa par gyur pat+to// sa gzhi ni skyed mos tshal dang / rdzing bu'i chu pad ma sa mdzes par byas pa dag gis gang bar 'dug ste/ byang gi spra myi
295b7(mdo): snyan gyi skyed mos tshal bas lhag par mdzes so// gcig tu na dga' ba'i tshal dang / shing rta sna tshogs can dang 'dra bar gyur da te/ sa phyogs de dag de ltar dga' dga' ltar 'dug kyang / lha dang lha ma yin dang / myi ra
295b8(mdo): dag de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyir sha na tu lo// gzhan yang de'i rgyal chen ris bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams rang rang gi 'khor la 'di skad ces 'dzerd to// grogs po dag ltos/ lha dang lha ma
295b9(mdo): yan dang kyi rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i las phyad par du 'phags la/ de bzhin gshegs pa la zhal zas kyi tha ma 'bul ba la brtson gyis/ grogs po dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
296a1(mdo): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la so so nas mchod pa bya'o// zhal zas kyi tha ma la dbul bar bya'o// gal te bdag cag gis phul ba'i zhal zas kyi tha ma bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes par gyur da na/ de las
296a2(mdo): bdag cag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa cher po thob par 'gyur ro// zhes de dag gis de skad ces smras nas g.yog 'khor mang po kangs myed pa dang bcas pas mchod pa snga ma'i nyis gyur da mchod pa dang / zhal zas mang po
296a3(mdo): dag khyer ro// me tog mang po dag kyang khyer te/ 'di lta ste/ mnad ra ba rnams dang / mnadar chen po rnams dang / ka ke ru ka rnams dang / ka ke ru ka chen po rnams dang / man 'jug ka rnams dang / man 'dzu chen po chen po
296a4(mdo): rnams dang / san ta na ka rnams dang / san tan ka chen po rnams dang / 'od can rnams dang / 'od can chen po rnams dang / kun tu 'od can rnams dang / 'od mtha' yas pa rnams dang / mdzes stug
296a5(mdo): rnams dang / mdzes sug chen po rnams dang / dga' byed rnams dang / dga' byed chen po rnams dang / dri mchog rnams dang / drim chog chen po rnams dang / spos kyi ngad ldan rnams dang / spos kyi da
296a6(mdo): ldan chen po rnams dang / kun tu dad ldan rnams dang / kun tu dad ldan chen po rnams dang / mtha' yas dad ldan rnams dang / mtha' yas dad ldan chen po rnams dang / lha rdzas kyi 'dab ma rnams dang / klu shing gi me tog nas
296a7(mdo): dang / yongs su sa rtol rnams dang / de lta bu gzhan dag kyang khyer nas/ bcom ldan 'das ka la ba der dong ste/ nyi ma'i gzi byin gyis srin bu me khyer gyi 'od zil dkyis mnan pa bzhin du/ rang rang gi ke zi byin gyis
296a8(mdo): thams cad kyi ris kyis mnan te nam zas ma bzhes nas phyogs gcig tu 'khong ngo // gzhan yang de'i rje lha'i dbang po brgya byim sus cu rtsa gsus pa'i rnarnams kyi 'khor dang bcas pas mchod pa sngam gyi'i nyis gyur
296a9(mdo): de'i rkyen du du tsham ze rem mo pa'i mye tog gi sna grangs du ma ming du 'ong ba rnams dang / yid du 'ong ba chen po rnams dang drogasung zhem po phyim lo// 'ang b.rangs chen po rothos kyis dog sbyar dkar ba/ thes smras kyi
296b1(mdo): rim pa dang ldan pa/ skar zhud gyi phreng ba du ma phug ron shug rtse ba dang ldan pa dag kyang sprul nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan
296b2(mdo): 'das ka la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni theg pa chen po'i mdo'i sde mtshan srung ba lags na/ bdag cag la thugs rtse
296b3(mdo): ba'i slad du bdag cag gis phul ba'i zhal zas bzhes su gsol// de skad ces gsol kyang zhal zas ma bzhes nas phyogs cig tu 'khod do// bam po
296b4(mdo): de'i rjes la mthard kyis 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris drug po rnams kyes steng gi bar snang la mchod pa dang 'od snga ma las khyad par du 'phag/ sa nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ de dag gi mtsho
296b5(mdo): pa'i nang na gdugs phal ba gang yin pa de yang kho ra khor yug tu gli/ nga bzhi pa'i khyon tsam mo// ba dan phal ba gang yin pa de yang rgya ma/ tshe chen po bzhi'i mthar thug ste/ shar phyogs kyi mtshonas nub
296b6(mdo): phyogs kyi rgya mtshor thug ste/ rlung gyis bskyod dam rlung gi phyar na ba dan de dag las pi bang gi sgra snyan pa zhong nas 'byig pa lta bur swA na pa dag 'byung ste/ de dag bcom ldan 'das sa phyag 'tshal nas
296b7(mdo): zhal zas bzhes par gsol ba btab kyang / bcom ldan 'das cad myi gsung bar nas re thag chad de phyogs gcig tu 'bod do// de'i srid pa'i rtse mor skyes pa rnams ma gtogs par gong ma'i yang gong ma'i sems can
296b8(mdo): gang yin pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ mchod pa rgya chen po'i tshogs dang chas te sprugs nas/ snga ma bzhin du phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// myi mched kyi bdag po tshangs pa tshangs ni
296b9(mdo): kyi wa'i bu dpag tu myed pa dag gis bskor dacing ma dram tu bdar te/ rang gi gzi byim gyis lha thams cad kyi gzil byin zi la kyis mnan nas/ mchod pa'i tshogs chen po dang chas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thar du dong ngo //
297a1(mdo): de dag gi ba dan phal pa gang yin pa de yang tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas 'phyang ste/ shing sa la zung gi drung du thug go// des kyang bcom ldan 'das la zhal zas bzhes par ga sol pa las/ bcom ldan 'das
297a2(mdo): kyis ma bzhes nas phyogs gcig du 'bod do// de nas de'i tshe lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzangs ris lha ma yin gi g.yog 'khor dpag tu myed pa dang bcas pas/ tshangs pa dang dbang po gnyis ma gtogs par de'i bar
297a3(mdo): kyi lha yod do cog gi 'od/ rang gi 'od kyis mog mog por byas nas de'i rkyend tu 'tshams pa'i mchod pa'i tsho gas dang rkyend tu 'tsham pa'i zhal zas dang chas te bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ngo // de'i gdugs phal pa yang chu
297a4(mdo): zheng du 'jig rten gyi khams chu du khyab pa tsam ste/ des kyang bcom lnga na 'das la zhal zas bzhes par gsol ba las/ bcom ldan la dadas kyis ma zhes nas langs te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas
297a5(mdo): bdud sdig can ki chung ma grangs myed pa'i 'khor dang bcas te/ se mas can dmyal ba thams cad kyi bar srang thams cad phye nas/ de dka la chu dang kha zas las stsogs pa ci 'dod pa byin te/ de dag la
297a6(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dran par gyis shig/ sbyin pa tha ma la rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig ces smras nas/ de dag la khyer bde bar gyur da cig ces dbugs phyung ngo //
297a7(mdo): sems can dmyal ba'i grong phyir mtshon chas gang zhing mye chen po 'bar ba rnams su yang sprin chen po bzhin du chu chen po phab nas sems can dmyal ba rnams kyis sngon ma myong ba'i bde ba dang ldan pa'i 'du shes bskyed de/ re
297a8(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus bdud kyi sems kyi gnas skabs de lta bur gyur da to// de'i 'khor kar yin pa de dag gis kyang gzhu dang ral gyi dang tho ba dgra sta dang / de je rtse gcig pa dang / mtshon kas pa na dang / sngags
297a9(mdo): kyi bai ra ka dang / lcags mda' dang / sha na kan+ti dang / mnga' dang par mdung dang / mdung rtse gcig pa las stsogs pa mtshon ma rnams yongs su spongs te/ chos lhur le nad par gyur to// de'i mchod pa yang s+tha snga ma
297b1(mdo): rnams la myed pa de lta bur gyur da te/ de'i gdugs phal pa'i chu zheng du yang 'jig rten thams bar ma'i khyod tsam mo// de ltar de mthu chen po dang ldan zhing rang gi chung ma rnams kyis rnga yab kyis g.yob bzhin du/ bcom ldan
297b2(mdo): 'das ka la ba der phyi nad nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'ge bos phyag 'tshal te/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas po dang / 'khor dang bcas
297b3(mdo): pas bdag gis phul ba'i zhal zas bzhes su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis da slaran chad theg pa chen po'i slad du sa~M dam bca' bar 'tshal te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang su yang rung / 'jigs pa'i slad
297b4(mdo): du 'am/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti 'tshal ba'i slad du 'am/ thob tu re ba'i slad du 'am/ gzhan gis bgyid du gsald pa 'am/ gzhan gis yid bsrung ba'i slad du yang rung ste/ theg pa chen po brjod par bgyi
297b5(mdo): na/ de'i don tu 'jigs pa dang myi dga' ba'i thams cad bsal/ ba'i gsang sngags bshad par 'tshal lo// / tad ya thA/ thag k+She Ta Ta ra/ thag kI/ ro ru re/ ma ha ro r+ya rA/
297b6(mdo): A la ma la ta la sA ha// // chos smra ba 'khrul pa dang / 2jigs pas gnod par gyur pa rnams chos kyi tshul la spobs pa ba skyed par bgyi ba dang / mu stegs pa rnams myos par bgyi ba dang /
297b7(mdo): das pa'i chos bsrung ba dang / bdag dang gzhan bsrung ba'i slad du bdag gis rang gi dam tshig gis smras pa'i gsang sngags 'di glang po'i 'jigs pa 'am/ ra kas zhung gi 'jigs pa 'am/ chu klung gi 'jigs pa 'am/
297b8(mdo): mye'i 'jigs pa rnams kyi nang du bsrung ba'i gzung sngags kyi don tu brjod pa gang lags pa de dag ni brjod pa tsam gis ji ltar ru sAl rang gi lus bsrungs pa de bzhin du/ bdag gis kayo dang sgyu ma mchis par de dag
297b9(mdo): 'jigs pa thams cad las bsrung bar bgyi/ stobs dang ldan par yang bgyid lags ma/ bcom ldan 'das kyis da zhal zas 'di bzhes par gsol zhes bskul to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud sdig
298a1(mdo): ca sa 'din ma sa na to// sdig cu dpyod pas kyi phyir gsos pa sa 'debs shig/ kus sngags kyi tshig ni sems can thams cad la phan phram byar chos kyi sbyi pas gyur pas ma bzhes par gyur
298a2(mdo): klung zing kyi sbyin pa ni de sa pang byin gyis sdig can khyod gsol bram 'debs shig ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das car gyi gsung bar gyur du to// lar gnyis lan gsum kyo bar du yang bdud dang bdud kyi bu moms
298a3(mdo): kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa las/ ma bzhes te re thag char nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas de'i tshe wA'u dbang myug chen po lnga'i bu dag e dag gis su dun tu ba dar te/ rang gi 'od kyis
298a4(mdo): tshangs pa dang / lha'i dbang po dang / lha ma yin dang / bdud kyi 'od rnams snag tsa'i gong bu bzhin du 'od myi gsal bar byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mchod pa rgya chen po nyis gyur da nyis gyur pas lhag
298a5(mdo): pa dag khyer nas der song ste/ de'i mchod rnams kyi nang na gdugs phal pa gang yin pa de dag/ chu zheng du stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par 'dug ste/ mchod pa de lta sngon bu
298a6(mdo): btang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thar du phyi dad te/ lan dum bskor ba bya sa nas zhabs la 'go bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
298a7(mdo): 'di skad ces gsol da to// bcom ldan 'das la bdag mchod pa brgyad pa ni sbar bu mchod pa bgyid pa dang 'dra ste/ bdag sbrang bu dang 'dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bgyid pa'i rdo ga la thog kyis kyang /
298a8(mdo): bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du zhal zas kyi tha ma gsol par ci ka nang zhes lan gnyis lan gsum du gsol ba btab kyang / lan gnyis lan gsum du bcom ldan 'das cad myi gsung bar 'gyur
298a9(mdo): te/ re thag chad nas langs te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun nas shar phyogs su 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung grangs myed pa gtams phrag dkrigs kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig
298b1(mdo): rten gyi khams yid phrogs sgra snyan mu thug ces bya ba zhig yod de/ re na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ des sras kyi bu bo nyan thos
298b2(mdo): lus chen mtha' yas pa la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod myi mched kyi 'jig rten gi khams su long la/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa zhes bya ba ring po
298b3(mdo): kyi thogs par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur gyis/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de'i don tu 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas zhal zas zhim po phan pa dag khyer te song shig/ mchod pa chen po dag phyir te song la/ de la
298b4(mdo): 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal zas 'di gsol te yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mdzad du gsol zhes kyis shig/ khyod kyis the tsom dang yid gnyis ci dang ci yod pa de dang de
298b5(mdo): dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de 'o na le legs par zhus shig/ dang / des khyod la lung bstan par 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sus chen mtha'
298b6(mdo): yas des legs so legs so zhes gsol nas/ de bzhin kags pa de la bskor ba byas nas zhabs la 'go bos phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen po grangs kyi
298b7(mdo): pas bskor da cing mdun du bdanganas kyi mjed kyi 'jig ched gi khams 'dir 'ongs so// de nas de'i tshe stong gsul gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di gsos rab tu g.yos/ 'gus da rab tu 'gus da/ 'jug
298b8(mdo): rab tu 'khrugs/ 'khorang rab tu 'khor da/ shur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur/ shikra shig rab tu shig shig/ mer mer rab tu mer ser/ ldes ldes rab tu ldem sdeso// de las sogs pa byas te/ sa chen po rab tu gsos
298b9(mdo): so// deras 'khor de dag gi ni par tshangs pa dang / dbang po dang / 'jig rten sbyor ba dang / rnam yin dang / dbang phyug chen po las phrogs pa lha rnams kyis sa gzhi de lta bu gyur da pa mtho ba nas spyi bung zhes bya ste/
299a1(mdo): 'jig shi ba dang rtog pa skams nas 'bros pa chas te/ rang rang gi 'od kyang kyi mthong zhing 'od nyams par gyur da to// de nas 'khor de nyid kyis rang nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa langs te/
299a2(mdo): lga'i tsho gas de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po dag a 'jigs shig/ ma 'jigs shig/ shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten ga khams gang ga'i klur grangs myed pa gtams phrag dkrigs kyi bye ma'i rdul pra
299a3(mdo): rab grangs myed pa snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gi khams yid 'phrog sgra snyan mu thug ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam mkha' dang mnyam pa zhes bya
299a4(mdo): ba da ltar bzhugs la 'tsho zhing bzhes te/ de bzhin gshegs pa des rang gi sras kyi bu bo nyan thos la bos te bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod myi mjed kyi 'jig rten gi kham su song la/ de na de bzhin
299a5(mdo): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shaka kya thub pa zhes bya ba yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'a/ gyur gyis/ de dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la zhal zas
299a6(mdo): kyi tha ma phul la/ 'od kyi the tsom dang yid gnyis ci yod pa de dag kyang legs par zhus shig dang / des khyod la lung bstand par 'gyur/ ro zhes bka' stsal da te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems
299a7(mdo): dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen po mtha' yas 'di matang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' grangs myed pas bskor du cing sa dum du bdar nas 'dir 'ongs pa de'i gzi brjid kyis khyed kyi 'od nyams par gyur to// de
299a8(mdo): 'ong ba la rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pas bdag cag gi de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa mdzad pa la yang ltos shig ces byas byas so// de nas 'khor de dag thams
299a9(mdo): cad kyis me long gi ngos la bdag gi gzugs mthong ba bzhin du/ 'jig rten ka khams dag ring po na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dang / 'jig rten gyi khams de mthong ngo // de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
299b1(mdo): pus 'khor re dgas 'dzin du ces smras so// ji skar khyod kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang de bzhin gshegs pa 'di mthong ba de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang 'jig rten gi khams gzhan dag
299b2(mdo): ltos shika/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni 'di ltar bdag nyid me ba yin te/ rang rang gnas na bzhugs bzhin du yang khyed la zhal ston par mdzad do// 'khor de dag gis smras pa/ kye sa de bzhin gshegs pa de ltar
299b3(mdo): bdag nyid che ba yang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba lta kyi hud ces zla zhing 'a'odod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen mtha' yas byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu myed pa dag kyis bskor
299b4(mdo): ba yang mthong ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus kyi ba spu'i phur bu ra re nas pad ma chen po 'byung ngo // pad ma dze bai re re la yang grong khyer ba dun khri brgyad stong bdun khri brgyad stong yod la/ grong khyer de dag
299b5(mdo): kyang yul yangs pa can gyi tha gru tsam sha sta ka ste/ rin po che sna bdun gyi ra ba dang / 'obs bdun rim kyis bskor da pa/ shing ta la 'i 'phreng bdun rim kyis mdzes par byas pa sha stag ste/ 'byor
299b6(mdo): pa dang / rgyas pa dang ldan zhing dga' dka' ltar 'dugs/ ra ba de dag/ kyang 'jas bu chu bo'i gser ga zags med pongon sdug kyis bsko rang to// bkam thams cad kyi bar bar na yang shing ljon pa kunan ga can 'bras
299b7(mdo): bu dang me tog dang ldan pa sna mang po dag yod do// shing ljon pa de dag gi yal ka rlud kyis bskyod pa las kyang sil snyan dga' bar byed pa'i sgra snyan cing chags su rung ba 'byung ba sna lnga lnga sgrogs te/ sgra de dag gis sems
299b8(mdo): can de dag rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// 'obs de dag thams cad kyang bsil zhing shel bzhin du dang ba dag gis kang bar 'dug ste/ de dag gi napa'o ra khor yug tu sems can de dag ri mu dag gis dka' zhing rgyu hA
299b9(mdo): byed do// chu de dag kyang pad ma dang / ud pal dang / ku mu ta shing rta'i par lo tsam sha stag gis brgya dad to// 'obs kyi 'o ra khor yug kyang bskyed mos tshal gyi 'phreng bas mdzes par byas te/ bskyed mos tshal la
300a1(mdo): sem sa rdzing du zas bu pa kri mad byed bu snga yod do// ri shu'i skye de dag kyang bdus dang / ud pa la dang / ku mu ta don pa sogs dri zhim mo shing na'i yang ma com na wAg gis khyegs par
300a2(mdo): 'dug la/ shing ljon pa me tog rgyas pa'i 'phreng bas mdzes par byas so// bskyed mos tshal khor khor yug na yang / ngang dur dang / zal mo dang thung thung shug dag gis pad ma'i ze 'bru myang bar byed do// Sho ra khor
300a3(mdo): uka ki bskyed mos tshal de dang de dag na yang 'ang khyim dag yod la/ khang pa re re la yang chu zheng du dpag tshad bzhi bzhi yod de/ cig pa ni gser dang / dngul dang / bye dur+ya dang / shel las byas/ sa ka'i ni kai ke ru las grub
300a4(mdo): pa ste/ nor bu'i 'jo char gyis speld cing snang bar byas pa'i mu tig gi do shal sbyangs pa dang ldan pa/ gser gyi rta babs chen po dang / skar zhung dang / dra ba dag gis brgyand pa'i zhar bzangs mthon po
300a5(mdo): gzhi ka ser ki bya ma bdald pa dang ldan pa sha stag ko// rdzing bu na mas kyu 'drus pa'i lam gser gyi thim smras them pa bco brgyad dang ldan ba dang / mtha thog thag tu gser ka chu shing ki 'phreng bas mdzes par
300a6(mdo): byas pa/ lha'i tsin dan gyi dri bsrung can gyi chu dang ldan pa sha stag go// grong khyer chen po de dag re re'i nang ma yang rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong brgyad phri bzhi stong yod de/ de dag thams cad kyang bud myed kyi tshogs dpag tu myed pa dag
300a7(mdo): kyis bskor da cing / 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan te rtse zhing dga' la dka' dragur spyod do// sems can gzhan dag kyang de dang 'dra ste/ sa phyogs ka tsa la ni da'i gos ltar re ka na bde ba tsan dan gi chus chag chag btab pa/
300a8(mdo): me tog ka sil mas gtor pa/ gzhan dag na rtse zhing dga' la dka' dgur spyod do// grong khyer chen po de dag na theg pa sme ma ka togs par/ theg pa gzhan gyi sma myed do// pad ma chen po de dka la yang seng ge'i
300a9(mdo): khri chen po gang pa gser dang dngul dang / bye rur+ya dang / shel las byas pa/ ka ling ka'i ris kyis g.yogs pa/ me bas 'os pa/ 'jig ter gsum na phul du byas pa sha stag gis dkris te/ seng ge'i
300b1(mdo): de dag la rgyal po de dka' khod cing / sems can gzhan dag theg pa chen po'i mdo sde rnams slob par byed de/ rgyal po de dag gi mdun nal la ni yi ge 'dri/ la la ni klog/ la la ni kha tor byed// de ltar byang chub sems dag
300b2(mdo): sems dpa' chen po lus chen mtha' yas kyi ba spu'i zhung bu nas skyes pa'i pad ma dag la 'khod pa'i sems can de dag 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i dka' ba dang ldan pa yang de dag yongs su spangs nas mya ngan gyis gdungs te sme/ swa /
300b3(mdo): 'dos cing / kyi hud kyi hud ces za zhing 'khod do// nyes gyurab tu mchod pa'i tshogs dbul bar byed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sus chen mtha' sas/ byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu myed pas brjon
300b4(mdo): te/ de lta bu'i 'byor da pa'i rnam pa dag ston cing / mchod pa'i cho ga sa chen po dang / zhal zas ches rgya che ba dag khyer 'ongs nas zhal zas re dag dang / pad ma de dag kau dri gsung tshor ba gang yin pa de dag kyang
300b5(mdo): nyon mongs pa dang bral bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i ma/ thu chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang mthong bar gyurapa/ to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen maH/
300b6(mdo): yas kyi tshad kyang nam mkha' dang mnyam par 'dug ste/ sus kyang mthong bar gyi nus so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus chen mtha' yas bcom ldan 'das kyi thang du song ste/
300b7(mdo): zhabs la 'ge bos phyag 'tshal te thal mo sbyar da nas 'di skad ces gsol da to// bdag gis phul ba bzhal zas bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes su gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das cad myi gsung bar gyur da te/ lan
300b8(mdo): gnyis lan gsum su gsol kyang bcom ldan 'das cad myi gsung bar bzhugs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de langs te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de bzhin du lce phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs da
300b9(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sras chen mtha' yas zhes bya ba 'khor gyi tshogs chen po dang ldan pa sha stag spags te/ de dag gi pad ma dang grong khyer kyi tshad kyang nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur gyis che ba dang // 'byor/
301a1(mdo): pa nyis 'gyur da nyis gyur kyis me ba shA stag dang chas te de dag der sbags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la pad ma dag kris mchod pa byas te/ snga ma bzhin du phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// shings la zung gyi
301a2(mdo): drung grub pa'i gnas de nyid na dkyil 'khor sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi tshad kyi sgo gyisani la sems can thams cad myi 'khod pa'i ko skabs ci yang myed de/ de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar lus che ba rang rang gi g.yog
301a3(mdo): 'khor dang bcas pa de rnams kyang kha cig ni sa phyogs smyung bu'i rtse mo'i khyon tsam la 'khod do// kha cig ni khab kyi rtse mo'i byon tsam la 'khod do// kha cig ni rtul 'phran kyi byon tsam la bag yangs su 'khod do// 'jig rten gyi las
301a4(mdo): rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag na byang chub sems dpal 'od pa de dag kyang thabs de lta bur lpags te 'khod do// 'dzam bu gling gi sems can yang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung dang / gnas brtan kun dga'
301a5(mdo): bo dang / rgyal po ma skyes dgra rnams ma gtogs par der ma 'od/ sa su yang myed de/ tha na myi gdugs pa dang / sbrul gdug pa dang / sdig pa dang / sdom las stsogs pa las myi bzad pa bcu drug byed
301a6(mdo): pa yan chad kyang der lhags so// sbyin byed mo'i bu dang / lha ma yin rtag tu khon kyi bsam pa can thams cad kyang sdig pa'i las spangs nas/ gcig la gcig bu dang ma dang sring mo dang 'dra bar sems par gyur to//
301a7(mdo): stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi 'ams na 'dod pa'i sems can thams cad kyang gcig la gcig pa bzhin du byams par byed de/ 'dod chen po ni ma gtogs so// myi mjed kyi 'jig rten ki khams 'di yang de bzhin
301a8(mdo): gshegs pa'i mthus bong ba dang / rdo dang / gseg ma dang / rtsu ba dang cher ma myed par gyur da te/ shing ljon pa rin po che'i khri shing kyis bkris pa/ mnyen zhing re ka na 'jam pa dag dang ldan zhing / 'jig rten ki khams bde ba
301a9(mdo): can dang 'dra bar gyur da to// sems can der lhags pa thams cad kyis kyang de na 'khod bzhin du ji ltar mye lor kyi ngos la rang gi gzugs brnyan snang ba bzhin du/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnyed kyi 'jig rten ki thams dang / sangs
301b1(mdo): rgyas kyi zhing 'byor da pa ldan pa gzhan dag kyang mthong ngo // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal nas 'od gzer kha dog sna tshogs sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / btsod ka dang / shel gyi kha dog lta bu dang
301b2(mdo): me lce lta bu dag byung ba gang yin pa de dag gis bya ba thams cad byas te phyin ci log ras bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi zhal du zhugs te myi snang bar gyur to// 'khor thams cad kyi 'od kyang des zil kyis non par gyur to// de nas
301b3(mdo): zhwadang phyi dang lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis 'od zer de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi lal du gyi snang bar gyur pa mthong nas/ 'jig zhing spyi bung zhes byas te/ rgyu myed par bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od gzer rnams phyir yod
301b4(mdo): nas myi snang bar 'gyur ba'i myi rigs na/ gor ma chag par phyogs bcu dag tu bya ba rnams zin nas/ da ni gdon myi za bar de bzhin gshe gas pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan
301b5(mdo): 'das kyis gang las kyang zhal zas ma bzhes na/ kye ma sems can thams cad la tshad myed pa bzhi spangs sam/ tsau smyur bar bzhugs par chad dam/ kye ma ci nyi ma dang zla ba nub bam// tsau dam
301b6(mdo): pa'i chos kyi gru bying ngam kyi hud kyi hud ces zla zhing 'a'od do// de nas de dag rang rang kyi yan lag rnams sbas par byas pa'i khrag phrag kis sa gzhi 'dam bu gyur to// chu klung ka ser ldan yang phrag
301b7(mdo): tu 'bab par gyur to// de nas 'khor de dag gi nang na grong khyer ku shi pa makar ba'i bu dge bsnyen skul byed ces bya ba de makar ba'i bu bco lnga dang thabs gcig tu langs te/ rang rang gi spyod lam bcos nas 'jig
301b8(mdo): rten dag na bltas te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo kayas pa'i lga nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ka la ba der logs su thal mo sbyard pa btud nas/ mchim myi thub bzhin du zhabs la
301b9(mdo): phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can thams cad nges par bsgral pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa
302a1(mdo): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la zhal zas kyi tha ma 'bul par 'tshal te/ bdag ni mgon ma mchis pa lags/ rtsa lag ma mchis pa lags/ skyabs ma mchis
302a2(mdo): pa lags/ phongs de re ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gis phul ba'i zhal zas bzhes te/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mdzad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das dper gsol da na/ khyim bdag kam
302a3(mdo): bram ze shin tu dbu lo 'ga' zhig gzhan gi yul du mchis la/ bdag nyid spro ba bskyed de/ mthar kyis zhing blas brtsams nas/ des mon blang mo sbyin pa thong bshol dang sbyared pa dag gis zhing la rdo dang / rtsu ba dang charam
302a4(mdo): mchis par bgyis te re ba chen po bskyed nas sprin chen po las char 'bab par sdod cing mchis pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi lus kyi zhing la/ nyes pa gsum dang bzhi dang bral ba'i yid dang ngag gi mon glang dang
302a5(mdo): shes pa'i thor gshol gis nyon mongs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rdod du rtsu ba dang tsher ma mchis par bgyis nas khyod kyi sprin chen po las chos kyi char pa 'bab pa la sdod cing mchis te/ dge slong gi dge
302a6(mdo): 'dun dang bcas par spyan 'dren na/ bdag gi dbul ba bstsags bu dang sems can thams cad la sman pa'i slad du/ bdag gis phul pa'i zhal zas bzhes su gsol/ bdag ni 'gon ma mchis pa skyabs ma
302a7(mdo): mchis pa lags na/ de bzhin gshegs pas bdag la sgra gcan zin bzhin du gzigs par gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyend pa rgyal ba gang zag zla myed pas/ 'gar ba'i bu skul byed la 'di
302a8(mdo): skad ces bka' stsal to// skul byed de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis khyod kyi zhal zas kyi tha ma sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa chen po bzhes par mdzad do// de nas lha dang kyi
302a9(mdo): dang lha ma yin de dag gis zhus byed kyis phul ba'i zhal zas kyi tha ma sbyin pa'i pha roso tu phyind pa chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pas bzhes so zhes zos nas/ ngo mtshar mad du byung nI
302b1(mdo): chos thos ste/ legs so legs so zhes gad chen po srung nas/ 'akar ba'i mu sul byed la 'di skad ces smras so// kye ma 'gar ba'i bu sul byed khyod sring de ba/ khyod kyis kyi lus thob pa yi phan 'dogs par gyur te
302b2(mdo): legs par thob po// sprul byed 'jig rten ma su dum para'i mye tog shin tu mdzes pa ni rnyed par dga'o// de bas kyang ches de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o// de bas kyang dad pa rnyed pa shi na tu dka'o// de tha
302b3(mdo): kyang ches chos thos pa rnyed pa dka'o// dpas kyang chas chas zas pa rnyed par dka'// de bas kyang ches de bzhin gshegs pa la zhal zas kyi tha ma dbul ba rnyed par dka'o// de bas ma kyi kyi da pa thos
302b4(mdo): par 'gar ba'i bu skul byed khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dper na ston sra 'bring po nya la sprin myed pa'i tshe/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor drim pa mdzes pa/ mthong ba la/ zla ba 'ba' shig mngon du snang ba de bzhin du/ khyod
302b5(mdo): kyis yul ba'i zhal zas kyi tha ma de bzhin gshegs pas ba zhes pas ne/ khyod 'ba' shig sems can thams cad la mngon tu snang ngo // khyod la yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal lo// skul byed khyod ni myo'i lus byed bzhin du
302b6(mdo): lha'i yang lga yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras sgra gcan zin dang 'dra'o zhes byas nas/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so// khyod ni myi ma yin te lha mchog yin// myi mchog gtso bo khyad par 'phags pa ste/
302b7(mdo): de phyir khyod la gsol ba 'di skad 'debs// ston pa yongs su mya ngan 'da' bar chas// bdag cag kun la brdze bas skul byed khyod// skye bo rnams la yul tu phan pa'i phyir// 'dir ni stond pa dpag myed 'gon po la/
302b8(mdo): bzhugs shing rgyu nang tu bdud rtsi ston ces gsol// srid las rnam grol mya 'da' bzhed la// gal te khyod kyis de ring ma gsol ma// bdag cag thams cad ma rung shes par gyis// de las phan phyir 'akon la gsol ba thob/
303a1(mdo): de nas la la zhig pa ma gnyis shi ba las phyir so so te// gson por 'dug pa mthong na// mchog tu dka' bar 'gyur ba de 'o na bzhin du// 'gar ba'i bu skul byed de mchog tu dka' bar gyur da nas// lag pa/
303a2(mdo): brkyang ste bcom ldan 'das la 'ag bos phyag 'tshal nas/ langs te tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// kye ma de dag rnyed pa legs par rnyed// myi'i 'jig rten skyes pa 'bras bu yod// da ni rnyed las stsogs las 'bral
303a3(mdo): myi 'gyur// myi bzad dmyal bar yang ni lhur myi 'gyur// deng 'dir rnyed pa chen po rnyed pa 'di// gser gyi phung po bas kyang skrag pa yin// dbang po bde gshegs 'akon dang phrad pas na// phyin chad bdag ni dud 'gros 'jigs
303a4(mdo): pa myed// sangs rgyas la ni dad pa gting zug pa/ deng rnyed u tum pa ra'i me tog bzhin// rab 'jigs yi dgas 'gro ba yongs spangs shing // lha myin skye ba'i sa bon myi bzad bcom// de bzhin gshegs 'byung dkon
303a5(mdo): dang deng phrad pa// khab kyi rtse mor sungs 'bru chags pa bzhin// de/ la pha rol da phyin da mchog sbyin phul bas// rtag tu lba'i 'gro bar 'a// pang bar 'gyur// chu gnas par ma chus myi chags pa ltar/ drang
303a6(mdo): srong chen po 'jig rten chos rnams kyis// chags myed phrad pas rtse sa bon kun// dungs phyung bdag ni 'khor ba'i mche chen rgal pa/ rgya ma chol chad kyi ru sbal zhar ba'i mgrin// gnya' shing myig tu chud dka' 'dra/
303a7(mdo): ba las// bde gshegs deng phrad de la sbyin pa phul// de sa na bdag gis nyon mongs gsog kun bcom// lha rnams kyis ni zhal zas bzang po dag/ phul yang bde gshegs ma bzhes dag las ni// me ra ma da'i mye tog/
303a8(mdo): 'dra ba zhes des/ bdag ni 'jig rten mchog dpal yon can// tshangs pa brgya byin las stsogs 'jig rten 'di// thams cad lpags te gus par bdag la mchod// khyu mchog gnas su son pa gang yin 'di// skye ba 'di
303a9(mdo): nyid la ni bdag gis thob// de nas thal mo sbyar da te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 'gon khyod mya ngan 'da' ba mthong nas ni// 'jig rten 'di kun sdug bsngal gzi da par gyur // dbang myed kyi hud ces ni
303b1(mdo): skad ces bu// 'di dag ma dong rtag tu sras pazhin gzigs// spun po'i gser gyi rtse mo rab mnog// mtsho chen dashus namadzes par gnas pa ltarang// chos kyi mnga' bdag khyod na chos ston cing // dge 'dun dbus su
303b2(mdo): mdzes par bzhugs su gsol// ji ltar nyi ma gzi can sha rad pa na// 'od gzer dag gis sprin bsrab sel pa ltar// drang srong chen po ye shes smon chen gyis// skye bo mang po mya ngan deng bsal mdzod// sems can
303b3(mdo): 'di dag dud mos myig smyig spangs shing // sdug bsngal gcig pu'i rgya mtsho'i gting tu zhugs// de phyir dad pa rnyed dka' bskyed mtshad cing // 'di rnams sdug bsngal chod la yum tu bzhugs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skul bye//
303b4(mdo): la bka' stsal dpa// tshul byed de ni de bzhin no// de ni de bzhin te/ sangs rgyas 'thung ba ni su du ba ra'i me tog bzhin du ni rab tu rnyed par dka dad pa yang rnyed par dka'o// chos thos pa yang rnyed par dka'o// re bani
303b5(mdo): gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshe/ zhal zas kyi tha ma sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa phun sum tshogs pa yang rnyed par da// 'o// skul byed gzhan yang khyod ma du mya ngan ma byed par bdag gis
303b6(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa la zhal zas kyi tha ma'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin de pa phun sum tshogs pa thob bo snyam du dga' ba skyed cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bcom ldan 'das bzhugs su gsol zhes de skad du khyod gso
303b7(mdo): ba ma 'debs shig/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos de kho na nyid la rtogs shig/ myi rtag pa nyid la 'jug par gyis shig// 'du byed rnams kyi rang bzhin shes par gyis ces bka' stsal nas/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
303b8(mdo): gsungs so// che ni shind tu ring yang 'jig par 'gyur// 'dir ni thams cad nges par 'chi bar 'gyur// 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten 'jig pa chos can yin// 'byor pa thams cad rgud par gzhol bar 'gyur// rtag tu lang /
303b9(mdo): cho ga pas nyes par 'joms// gzugs bzang dang myed nad kyis 'jig par 'gyur// srog ni 'chibs rtsa nas 'byin par byed// 'jig rten kun na brtag po ci yang byed// dbang phyug myi rtag che sang myi rtag ste// skye bo stu/
